original: You had ten more minutes then I was leaving.
string: 你还有十分钟，然后我就走了。

original: Why is it I never ask YOU to follow ME?
string: 为什么我从来没有要求过你跟随我？

original: Yes, of course.
string: 是的，当然。

original: I need to trade something with you.
string: 我需要和你交易一些东西。

original: If it's a log, no. If it's a jazbay crostata, then yes.
string: 如果是木头，不行。如果是黑曲果馅饼，那就可以。

original: Oh yes just go rooting around in my things.
string: 哦，对啊，就去翻找我的东西。

original: Fine, but if it's too heavy I might conveniently drop it somewhere.
string: 好的，但如果太重我可能会方便地在某处掉下它。

original: You touch my letters, you're dead.
string: 你触碰我的信件，你就死定了。

original: Wait here.
string: 在这里等着。

original: What am I, a brute to be commanded?
string: 我是什么，让你命令的野蛮人？

original: How about, YOU go THERE? I'll stay behind and have a snack.
string: 那你去那里？我会留下来吃点东西。

original: Go off then. I have some reading to catch up on.
string: 那你走吧。我有一些阅读要赶上。

original: Very well. I will stand around here shuffling to and fro.
string: 好吧，我会在这里来回踱步。

original: Boethiah blesses my blade, and gives me strength to wield it in her name.
string: 波耶西亚祝福我的剑，给予我力量以她的名义挥舞。

original: I shall guard you on our journeys.
string: 我会在我们的旅程中保护你。

original: Where shall we travel? I am prepared for anything.
string: 我们应该前往哪里？我已经做好了准备。

original: I'm glad to travel with you. We make a good team.
string: 很高兴和你一起旅行。我们是一个好团队。

original: If there's danger, get behind me and I'll hold them off.
string: 如果有危险，站在我身后，我会挡住它们。

original: There's a stark beauty in these lands.
string: 这片土地有着刻骨铭心的美丽。

original: Would you care for some sparring practice? Perhaps later.
string: 你愿意来点切磋练习吗？也许以后吧。

original: If you hear a screeching sound, watch out for cliff racers. Some yet survive.
string: 如果你听到尖叫声，小心悬崖跃行者。有些尚未灭绝。

original: Watch out for bounty hunters. They might be after me.
string: 小心赏金猎人。他们可能追着我来的。

original: It is nice to be out of the Monastery, traveling.
string: 走出修道院旅行是一件愉快的事情。

original: We should stay off the roads, less chance of being seen that way.
string: 我们应该远离道路，这样被发现的几率会小一些。

original: I prefer traveling where there's no ash in the air.
string: 我更喜欢在空气中没有灰烬的地方旅行。

original: I'd like to climb up the nearest peak if we could spare the time. Would be a good vantage point.
string: 如果我们有时间的话，我想登上附近的山峰。那里应该是一个不错的瞭望点。

original: Perhaps it is time for a walking song! No? Fine.
string: 也许是时候唱支行走的歌了！不行吗？好吧。

original: Care for a drink? I find a bit of Sujamma keeps my legs fresh.
string: 想喝点什么吗？我发现一点苏贾玛能让我的腿保持清爽。

original: I hope we go to all sorts of exciting places. Travel keeps the mind fresh, Azura teaches.
string: 希望我们去各种令人兴奋的地方。旅行使心智清醒，阿祖拉教导。

original: Need something to eat? I have some guar jerky.
string: 需要吃点什么吗？我有一些瓜尔干肉。

original: Want a drink? I have some Matze left.
string: 要喝一杯吗？我还有一些马泽剩下。

original: My heart sings to travel with you. It sings of glory and conflict.
string: 我的心随你而去，歌颂荣耀和冲突。

original: The days are never dull with you.
string: 和你在一起的日子从未无聊。

original: Our foes will taste the bitter blade of defeat.
string: 我们的敌人将尝到失败的惨败之刃。

original: A good jog helps break a nice sweat. I could do this all day.
string: 跑步有助于出汗。我可以整天这样做。

original: I once had to repair my weapon and armor periodically, but I havn't had to do that in years.
string: 我曾经需要定期修理我的武器和盔甲，但这已经好几年没有必要了。

original: My blade yearns for a fight. Let's find something to kill.
string: 我的剑渴望战斗。让我们找点东西杀吧。

original: Drelyra says my poetry is getting decent. Want to hear some?
string: 德莉拉说我的诗歌变得不错了。想听一些吗？

original: I've been working on my poetry. Mind if I share a few poems with you?
string: 我一直在写我的诗。你介意我跟你分享几首诗吗？

original: Blood. Like rivers of red water. Bad dreams. ... That one's no good.
string: 血。就像红色的河流。噩梦。……那个人不行。

original: A red dance, blades swirling in confusion. Partners, for a time, till one remains.
string: 一场红色的舞蹈，刀锋在混乱中旋转。舞伴，暂时，直至只剩一人。

original: Sweet victory, a calm wind blowing. Bitterness at your feet, but not yours to bear.
string: 甜蜜的胜利，轻风拂面。苦涩在你脚下，但不该是你承担的。

original: The call of hawks, strident sirens of the hunt. Ever searching.
string: 猎鹰的呼唤，狩猎的尖锐警报。不停地寻找。

original: Rain hides the approach, covers your trail.
string: 雨掩盖了接近，掩盖了你的踪迹。

original: Rain is great for getting up close as it confuses arrows and spells.
string: 雨天可以帮助你靠近敌人，因为它会让箭和法术迷惑。

original: I love the rain. Makes everything smell so fresh, I almost forget the smell of blood.
string: 我喜欢雨。让一切都闻起来那么清新，我几乎忘了血腥的气味。

original: Be careful not to slip in all the mud.
string: 小心不要在泥泞中滑倒。

original: What a great day for a journey. Yes I know it's raining.
string: 这样一个旅程多美好啊。是的，我知道下雨了。

original: Do you like the rain? I love a good thunderstorm.
string: 你喜欢下雨吗？我喜欢一场好的雷暴。

original: Be careful, we might not see foes until much closer than normal in this weather.
string: 小心，我们在这种天气下可能比平常更接近了才能看到敌人。

original: Raindrops like old blood. Tears of the Aedra falling. Sucked into greedy ground.
string: 雨滴像旧血一样。众神的泪水在落下。被贪婪的大地吸入。

original: Snow. Always with the snow.
string: 雪。总是伴随着雪。

original: Snow means footsteps. We could be tracked quite easily.
string: 雪意味着足迹。我们很容易被追踪。

original: My feet are cold as ice wraiths right now.
string: 我的脚现在冷得像冰鬼。

original: We get snow sometimes back at Bal Maryen. Usually a dirty kind of snow.
string: 在巴尔莫兰时，有时也会下雪。通常是脏兮兮的雪。

original: Better lace up your cloak, this snowstorm's looking to get worse.
string: 最好系上你的披风，这场暴风雪看起来会更糟。

original: Might need to invest in some warmer furs if it keeps snowing like this.
string: 如果雪一直下，我可能需要投资一些更暖和的毛皮。

original: If this snow gets worse we might need to find shelter.
string: 如果下雪越来越大，我们可能需要寻找庇护所。

original: We'll be a lot warmer with a belly full of Shein and a few pretty lasses. Time to get out of this snow.
string: 吃饱微醺，再加上一些漂亮姑娘，我们会暖和很多。是时候离开这片雪地了。

original: Weather's clear. We're too exposed.
string: 天气晴朗。我们太过暴露。

original: Got a good view with it nice and clear like this.
string: 这样视野很好，清晰明了。

original: When the sun is out like this, we can be easily seen.
string: 像这样太阳照耀着，我们容易被看到。

original: A crisp and sunny day, nNothing like Morrowind.
string: 一个晴朗的阳光明媚的日子，跟晨风一点也不像。

original: Not a bad night for a trek, as long as the skies stay clear.
string: 今天晚上不错，只要天空保持晴朗。

original: It's nice out tonight, but probably will snow or rain tomorrow.
string: 今晚天气很好，但明天可能会下雪或下雨。

original: Good clear nights like this never happen in Morrowind.
string: 像这样的晴朗夜晚在晨风从未发生过。

original: Be a good night to watch the stars.
string: 今晚很适合看星星。

original: Oh we're doing the sneaking thing.
string: 哦，我们要潜行。

original: This is more Mephala's path than Boethiah's.
string: 这更像是梅法拉的轨迹，而不是波耶西亚的。

original: I'll do my best to hide.
string: 我会尽力隐藏自己。

original: I'll skulk for now but I see a foe, and I'm rushing in.
string: 暂时我会潜伏，但一旦看到敌人，我会冲上去。

original: If we can get the element of surprise, all the better.
string: 如果能偷袭成功就更好了。

original: Stick to the shadows, I think.
string: 保持在阴影中，我想。

original: I wouldn't mind carrying some of that stuff.
string: 我不介意帮忙搬一些东西。

original: You look a bit overburdened there. I could help.
string: 你看起来有些累赘。我可以帮忙。

original: I'm all for a heavy load but that looks back-breaking.
string: 我支持背负沉重的东西，但那看起来简直要把腰拧断了。

original: We could pawn some of that junk.
string: 我们可以变卖一些那些废物。

original: You're making my muscles sore just looking at you.
string: 光是看着你就让我的肌肉酸痛。

original: I drop one more pebble in your pack your knees will probably buckle.
string: 如果我再往你的背包里放一块鹅卵石，你的膝盖可能就会软了。

original: I wonder what treasures lie buried in this place.
string: 我想知道这个地方隐藏着什么宝藏。

original: What's around the next corner? Bandits, or something worse?
string: 下一个转角会有什么？强盗，或者更糟糕的东西？

original: It's a bit dark in here.
string: 这里有点黑暗。

original: Might want to let me go first.
string: 也许应该让我先走。

original: Stay behind me and you'll be safe.
string: 跟在我后面，你会安全的。

original: Boethiah revels in places like this.
string: 波耶西亚会对这样的地方感到欢欣的。

original: We should rush in quickly, for the element of surprise.
string: 我们应该快速冲进去，以实现突袭的效果。

original: This reminds me of a job I did once. Quick in and out? Not so quick.
string: 这让我想起我曾经做的一份工作。快进快出？不那么快。

original: If we go into enough of these places, the Order will have its funds restored in no time!
string: 如果我们进入足够多的这些地方，“灰纱修会”将很快恢复资金！

original: I don't like the look of this place.
string: 我不喜欢这个地方的样子。

original: I changed my mind. I do like the look of this place.
string: 我改变主意了。我确实喜欢这个地方的样子。

original: I've learned the hard way to watch for traps on the ground. Pressure plates and tripwires usually.
string: 我已经吃了很多苦头，学会了留意地面上的陷阱。通常是压力板和绊线。

original: Once we've cleared this place we should do some skinning.
string: 我们清理完这个地方后，应该去剥皮。

original: These brutes won't even know what killed them.
string: 这些畜生连死因都不会知道。

original: Better not be bears. I hate bears. Why can't it be men in these caves?
string: 最好不是熊。我讨厌熊。为什么这些洞穴里不能是人呢？

original: Don't worry I'll protect you from whatever beasts come our way.
string: 放心，我会保护你免受任何来袭的野兽。

original: Be prepared. This will get dangerous.
string: 做好准备。这会变得危险。

original: I'll try not to spoil the pelts and components with my cleave.
string: 我会尽量不用我的弓破坏毛皮和器件。

original: Town time means drinking time.
string: 城镇时间意味着喝酒时间。

original: I bet there's a bounty board we can read through.
string: 我打赌一定有一个赏金榜我们可以查看。

original: Stewards and headmen usually offer jobs at places like this.
string: 管家和村长通常在这种地方提供工作。

original: Can we stop by a tavern for a bit?
string: 我们可以在酒馆里停一停吗？

original: Are you hungry? I'm hungry. Let's get some food.
string: 你饿吗？我饿了。我们去弄点食物吧。

original: Think they have any mercenary work here?
string: 想他们这里有雇佣工作吗？

original: I hope they haven't heard about my bounty. Shame to have to crack some skulls.
string: 希望他们没有听说我有赏金。不想不得不打破一些头。

original: Might want to swing by the blacksmith. I'd like to sharpen my weapon.
string: 也许应该去找铁匠。我想要磨利我的武器。

original: Find me the prettiest wench in this town! I'll trust your judgement.
string: 帮我找到镇上最漂亮的女人！我相信你的判断。

original: I'm hungry. Bet you fifty gold they don't have any bantam guars.
string: 我饿了。打赌五十金币他们没有任何巴甘瓜。

original: Not a bad place, but I do prefer Morrowind.
string: 不是个坏地方，但我更喜欢晨风。

original: Are we going to be here long? I might find a nice fire and some company if so.
string: 我们会在这儿待很久吗？如果是的话，我可能会找到一个舒适的火源和一些伙伴。

original: I could use some supplies. Good call.
string: 我需要一些补给。好主意。

original: Vendressa would just steal this, but I'm going to buy it.
string: 温德丽莎只会偷走这个，但我会买下来。

original: Think Drelyra would like this? I bet she would.
string: 德莉拉会喜欢这个吗？我打赌她会的。

original: Check if they have any Sujamma. Hard as Oblivion to find.
string: 看看他们有没有苏亚玛。难以找到比奥勿瑞角更难的了。

original: Shall we be here long? Maybe I should wait outside.
string: 我们要在这里待多久？也许我应该在外面等。

original: I'll try and stand menacingly behind you, might get a discount.
string: 我会试图威胁地站在你身后，或许能得到折扣。

original: Why are they looking at me like that? Maybe I intimidate them?
string: 他们为什么那样看着我？也许我让他们感到害怕了？

original: I'm getting bored, we should finish up in here.
string: 我开始感到无聊，我们应该快点结束这里的事情。

original: I need to pick up some more health potions.
string: 我需要补一些更多的治疗药水。

original: What's that sign say? Who embellishes their signs like an idiot? It's practically unreadable.
string: 那个牌子上写着什么？谁像个白痴一样装饰他们的牌子？几乎看不清楚。

original: I'd better get a peace offering for Selvoneth.
string: 我最好给赛尔沃内斯准备一个和解的礼物。

original: Ruvi would like what they have on offer here.
string: 鲁维对这里所提供的东西感兴趣。

original: Wonder if we have any books of epic poems lying about?
string: 想知道我们是否有史诗诗歌的书籍横临？

original: Never been very domestic, but this place is nice enough.
string: 我从未擅长家务，但这地方还不错。

original: To properly bless this home, we'll need a sacrifice.
string: 要好好为这个家庭祝福，我们需要献祭。

original: We should celebrate our return with a feast.
string: 我们应该以盛宴庆祝我们的归来。

original: Needs more weapon racks, I think.
string: 这里需要更多的武器架，我想。

original: This is a very nice place. I'm glad to call it home.
string: 这是一个非常好的地方。我很高兴称之为家园。

original: I warn you, I still plan to wake up at dawn to prepare for the day.
string: 我警告你，我还是打算在黎明之时起来准备一天。

original: Just because we're here doesn't mean we can let down our guard. Learned that the hard way.
string: 我们在这里并不意味着能放松警惕。以前就吃过苦头。

original: Since we're home, we should grab a few drinks and relax.
string: 既然我们回家了，我们应该喝点酒，休息一下。

original: Shall we be off to the sparring room?
string: 我们去练剑室吗？

original: I don't mind being home. Gives me some down time.
string: 我不介意待在家里。给我一些休息时间。

original: Nice to be home for once.
string: 能回家一次真好。

original: We make a good team. Allow me to show you a few combat moves, should you ever wish to fight with stances and maneuvers such as mine.
string: 我们是一个很好的团队。让我向你展示一些战斗技巧，如果你想学习像我这样的姿势和动作。

original: I think I can help you with your defenses. Good footwork and a good fit are of equal import.
string: 我觉得我可以帮你加强防御。良好的脚步和合适的装备同等重要。

original: Pray we meet again as friend.
string: 愿我们再次以朋友的身份相遇。

original: What is it? Oh, goodbye.
string: 怎么了？哦，再见。

original: So long and be well.
string: 一路顺风。

original: Good day, ser'a.
string: 你好，ser'a。

original: May the blood on the ground be your foe's.
string: 愿地上的血液属于你的敌人。

original: May Boethiah guide your blade.
string: 愿波耶西亚引导你的利刃。

original: Has Boethiah sent me another challenger?
string: 波耶西亚再次派遣了另一位挑战者吗？

original: We meet again!
string: 我们又见面了！

original: Good day to you, I say good day!
string: 祝你好运，我说祝你好运！

original: Why, hello there.
string: 你好。

original: I greet you.
string: 欢迎你。

original: Are you on my list? No. You live.
string: 你在我的名单上吗？不，你还活着。

original: Bodies pile up. Just as Boethiah commands.
string: 尸体堆积如山，就像波耶西亚所吩咐的那样。

original: Boethiah must have found them wanting.
string: 波耶西亚必然发现他们有所不足。

original: By the smell, they're freshly dead.
string: 从味道看，它们是新鲜死去的。

original: Better cut off its head just in case of necromancers.
string: 最好砍掉它的头，以防万一有死灵法师。

original: A fight! Mind if I jump in?
string: 打架！介意我加入吗？

original: I do love a good melee.
string: 我喜欢好的近战战斗。

original: We should dive into this fight.
string: 我们应该投身这场战斗。

original: Boethiah approves of struggle.
string: 波耶西亚赞同斗争。

original: What's with the little toy? Give me a bigger weapon!
string: 那小玩具怎么了？给我一个更大的武器！

original: I need a bigger sword!
string: 我需要一把更大的剑！

original: I guess this little thing will do.
string: 我猜这个小东西还凑合吧。

original: Can I get a full sword, not half of one?
string: 能给我一把完整的剑吗，不是半截的？

original: I will cleave you in twain!
string: 我会把你劈成两半！

original: Taste my steel!
string: 尝尝我的钢铁之刃吧！

original: Boethiah demands death!
string: 波耶西亚要求死亡！

original: I'll break right through that feeble defense!
string: 我会轻而易举地突破那个软弱的防御！

original: They're at range, switching to bow!
string: 他们在远处，切换到弓箭！

original: Time to fight from a distance!
string: 是时候远距离作战了！

original: I think I can shoot them from here!
string: 我想我可以从这里射他们！

original: Might run low on arrows.
string: 可能会用箭头不足。

original: Oh no you don't! I'll get you!
string: 哦不！我要抓到你！

original: I'll catch you, and gut you!
string: 我会逮到你，然后解剖你！

original: Coward! Get back here!
string: 懦夫！回来！

original: Boethiah demands struggle, not cowardice!
string: 波耶西亚要求的是挣扎，而不是胆怯！

original: You're dead when I reach you!
string: 当我接近你的时候，你就死定了！

original: Look how they run! Pathetic!
string: 看他们跑得多可悲啊！

original: Have at you!
string: 来吧！

original: Die!
string: 去死吧！

original: It's time for you to bleed!
string: 该你流血的时候到了！

original: Boethiah guide my blows!
string: 波耶西亚指引我的一击！

original: Argh!
string: 啊！

original: Ahh!
string: 啊！

original: Ra!
string: 拜托！

original: Aah!
string: 啊！

original: Grr!
string: 咕噜！

original: Arrg!
string: 啊！

original: I failed leading the Ashen Veil, but we shall rebuild.
string: 我领导灰灰幕失败了，但我们会重建。

original: As the Hand of Mephala, I must keep her secrets secure.
string: 作为梅法拉之手，我必须保守她的秘密。

original: I feel like I failed my Sisters, but they have forgiven me.
string: 我觉得我辜负了姐妹们，但是她们已经原谅了我。

original: It will be many years before our Order is as strong as it once was.
string: 要等很多年，我们的教团才能像从前那样强大。

original: Bal Meryan was my crowning achievement, I took it from an abandoned border fort into a thriving Monastery.
string: 巴尔莫兰是我的巅峰之作，我把它从一座被遗弃的边境要塞变成了一个繁荣的修道院。

original: To where do we travel?
string: 我们将前往何处？

original: I miss Morrowind, its ash and fire, its history and promise.
string: 我想念晨风，火焰，历史和希望的晨风。

original: Stay off the roads, stay hidden.
string: 远离道路，保持隐身。

original: If anyone looks at us too long, I shall pluck out their eyes.
string: 如果有人盯着我们看太久，我会剜掉他们的眼睛。

original: Mephala cautions that assassins or bounty hunters could be hidden around any corner.
string: 美法拉警告说刺客或赏金猎人可能藏匿在每个角落。

original: Raven Rock is a rough frontier town compared to the wonders Morrowind once had.
string: 与曼德罗克相比，乌鸦岩是一个艰难的前沿小镇。

original: Most towns and cities in Morrowind were devastated by the Red Year, but the capital held strong.
string: 晨风的大部分城镇和城市都在于赤色年毁坏，但首都仍坚挺。

original: You would like Mournhold. It's proud spires weathered the Red Year unharmed.
string: 你会喜欢哀伤之城。它傲立的尖塔在红年中毫发无损。

original: I remember the Red Year well. Our Monastery struggled for seasons.
string: 我还记得赤红之年。我们的寺庙为此付出了艰苦。

original: Look for plants for the grotto. I have it enchanted so most things can grow there.
string: 为洞穴寻找植物。我已经施加了魔法让大多数植物能够在那里生长。

original: Wherever we travel, there are reagents to find if your eyes are keen enough.
string: 无论我们去哪里，只要留心，就能找到各种草药。

original: Mephala's guidance tells me nothing of this place.
string: 梅法拉的指引对这个地方毫无帮助。

original: Would that the rest of my Sisters were here to journey with us.
string: 希望我的其他姐妹也在这里与我们同行。

original: Please collect any scrolls or books we find. All knowledge is sacred.
string: 请收集我们找到的任何卷轴或书籍。所有知识都是神圣的。

original: Mephala has spoken of this place. I may not share what she says.
string: 梅法拉提及过这个地方。我可能不会分享她说过什么。

original: The price of failure should be death, but for some it is life.
string: 失败的代价应该是死亡，但对于有些人来说是生命。

original: Our path is clouded. We should consult Drelyra to see if Azura has shared any wisdom.
string: 我们的道路被遮蔽了。我们应该去找德莉拉，看看阿祖拉有没有分享任何智慧。

original: I traveled many years with Tirvandi, the former Hand of Boethiah. She died in the chaos at Bal Meryan.
string: 我曾与波耶西亚前使徒蒂尔万迪一起多年。她死于巴尔莫兰的混乱之中。

original: In our journeys, if we come across Orsimer savages, make no agreement with them.
string: 在我们的旅程中，如果遇到兽人野蛮人，不要和他们达成任何协议。

original: War is as central to man or mer as breathing.
string: 战争对于人类或精灵来说如同呼吸一样重要。

original: It is not the obvious blade, but the hidden one you should fear.
string: 你应该害怕的不是显眼的刀，而是隐藏的刀。

original: A hidden blow, dealt from behind, is most sacred.
string: 一个隐藏的打击，从背后打出，是最神圣的。

original: Ask not what you can do for Mephala, but what you MUST do for Mephala.
string: 别问你能为梅法拉做什么，而问你必须为梅法拉做什么。

original: The Reclamations are the three Daedra - Azura, Boethiah, and Mephala - who have reclaimed their rightful place in the Tribunal.
string: 复仇三神是阿祖拉、波耶西亚和梅芙拉，他们重新占据了在三一神庭中的正当位置。

original: Vivec, Almalexia, and Sotha Sil are still revered as Saints, but no longer as Living Gods.
string: 维瓦克，艾玛莉西娅和索瑟希尔仍然受到尊崇，但不再是活着的神。

original: I sacrificed two Argonians and this is the weather we got? I should have found a third.
string: 我牺牲了两个亚龙人，结果这就是天气？我应该弄到第三个。

original: We should find somewhere to dry off.
string: 我们应该找个地方晾干。

original: Rain hides your movement and quiets your stride.
string: 雨隐藏了你的行动，并减轻了你的步伐声。

original: Death in a rainstorm has a very different cadence. A gurgle rather than a shout.
string: 在暴风雨中死去的声音是非常不同的。是潺潺声而不是喊叫声。

original: I'm a bit soggy. Can we stop to freshen up?
string: 我有点淋湿了。我们能停下来清凉一下吗？

original: Oh look, it's raining. How surprising.
string: 哦看，下雨了。好惊讶。

original: Why travel about in the rain? We could just wait.
string: 为什么要在雨中四处旅行？我们可以等着。

original: Only fools or the desperate journey out in the rain. Which are you?
string: 只有愚者或绝望者才会在雨中旅行。你是哪种？

original: More snow? Of course more snow.
string: 更多的雪？当然还有更多的雪。

original: Oh look. It's snowing.
string: 哦，看，下雪了。

original: I can't feel my fingers, it's so cold.
string: 我的手指都感觉不到了，太冷了。

original: At least snowfall muffles sound. That's about all it's good for.
string: 至少降雪能减弱声音。这大概就是它唯一的好处了。

original: None of the scriptures say anything about snow. I suppose that means I have to make up my own mind.
string: 圣典中并没有提到雪。我猜这意味着我必须自己拿主意了。

original: Better than an icestorm.
string: 比起暴风雪还是好些。

original: I'd rather an ash storm than this unending snow.
string: 我宁愿有一场火山灰风暴，也不要这无尽的雪。

original: We should find somewhere to warm up.
string: 我们应找个地方取暖。

original: I feel a bit exposed when it's so clear.
string: 天气这么晴朗时，我觉得有点暴露。

original: It's a good day for traveling.
string: 这是一个适合旅行的好天气。

original: Finally, a day without rain or snow.
string: 终于，一个没有雨雪的一天。

original: Clear and sunny? They'll still never see me coming.
string: 晴朗明朗？他们永远也不会看到我来袭。

original: The stars certainly are beautiful tonight.
string: 今晚的星星确实很美。

original: Mephala's cloak cannot always obscure the heavens.
string: 麦芙拉的斗篷并不能总是遮掩天空。

original: It was a night like this when we fled our home.
string: 我们逃离家园的那一晚是个夜晚。

original: I don't mind journeying at night if it's weather like this.
string: 如果天气像这样，我不介意在夜晚旅行。

original: Mephala cloak you, ser'a.
string: 梅法拉庇佑你，ser'a。

original: We hide in shadow.
string: 我们藏在阴影里。

original: They'll never see us coming.
string: 他们永远也不会看出我们的到来。

original: Stealth. A wise decision.
string: 隐秘。明智的决定。

original: This is how we should take every approach. Slowly and quietly.
string: 这就是我们应该采取的每一种方式。缓慢而安静。

original: Stay quiet. Stay hidden.
string: 保持安静。保持隐藏。

original: Are you a pack guar?
string: 你是个负责的坐骑牛吗？

original: You seem like a pack guar with all that junk.
string: 你看起来像一只满载着杂物的包骆驼。

original: Please don't load me up with as much clutter as you're lugging about.
string: 请不要给我装载你携带的那么多杂物。

original: All those useless things look quite heavy.
string: 那些无用的东西看起来很沉重。

original: Drop some of that before you harm yourself.
string: 把一部分放下，免得伤到自己。

original: Watching you limp along is like torture.
string: 看着你一瘸一拐的走路简直是折磨。

original: It's tempting to light a torch, but that ruins your stealth.
string: 点燃火把很诱人，但会破坏你的潜行。

original: Stay quiet and we can get the advantage.
string: 保持安静，我们才能占据优势。

original: Watch for traps. Unless you like pain.
string: 小心陷阱。除非你喜欢痛苦。

original: Lets find the treasure and be out of here.
string: 让我们找到宝藏然后离开这里。

original: I hear the whisper of a word. It says "leave".
string: 我听到了一个字的低语。它说“离开”。

original: I'll leave the looting to you.
string: 留下抢劫给你。

original: You really should start paying me for coming into these places.
string: 你真的应该开始给我付钱进入这些地方。

original: The Hand of Mephala. Traipsing about in the dark. Fitting.
string: 梅法拉之手。在黑暗中徘徊。恰到好处。

original: Best keep a watch out. Lots of ambushes in places like this.
string: 最好保持警惕。像这样的地方经常有埋伏。

original: I hope the treasures you find make their way back to the Monastery.
string: 我希望你找到的宝藏能回到修道院。

original: I wonder. Do you come into places like this regularly? Mephala is pleased.
string: 我在想。你经常来这样的地方吗？梅法拉很满意。

original: There are probably some dangerous foes down here.
string: 这下面可能会有一些危险的敌人。

original: I'll leave the beast skinning to you.
string: 剥兽皮的活交给你了。

original: I hate animals. Invisibility and muffle can't hide us from their damned noses.
string: 我讨厌动物。隐形和消声不能让我们摆脱它们该死的鼻子。

original: We're in a beast lair. What joy. Let's go find the dankest corner and dig around.
string: 我们在一个野兽巢穴。多么快乐。让我们去找最潮湿的角落挖探一下。

original: Mephala save me. Why are we in this fetid lair?
string: 梅法拉保佑我。我们为什么会在这个恶臭的巢穴里？

original: Lets kill these brutes quickly and get out of here.
string: 让我们快速杀死这些畜生，然后离开这里。

original: Do you just... regularly wander into animal lairs?
string: 你只是...经常闯进动物巢穴吗？

original: I wonder if this worthless place has a passable inn.
string: 我在想这个无价之地是否有一家过得去的客栈。

original: Sewage in the streets? We are definitely not in Morrowind.
string: 街上有污水？我们绝对不在晨风了。

original: Who's in charge here? The hygiene is abominable.
string: 这里是谁负责？卫生情况糟透了。

original: Please do consider checking for tasks or bounties. We could use the coin.
string: 请考虑检查一下任务或悬赏。我们需要金钱。

original: Another 'town' with no bookstore. What a congregation of s'wits.
string: 又一个没有书店的“城镇”。真是一群蠢货。

original: If you can find the one literate person in town, I need to get a few scrolls.
string: 如果你能找到镇上唯一有文化的人，我需要几个卷轴。

original: We should swing by the herbalist for ingredients.
string: 我们应该去草药师那里买些材料。

original: The sooner we leave this travesty of a settlement, the better.
string: 我们尽快离开这个糟糕的定居点会更好。

original: Mephala warns me to stay away from places like this.
string: 梅法拉警告我远离这样的地方。

original: If there's a magical goods shoppe here we... What? Skyrim doesn't have those?
string: 如果这里有个魔法用品店我们就...什么？天际没有那些店吗？

original: If there's a bookstore we should... WHAT? No bookstores?
string: 如果有书店我们应该……什么？没有书店？

original: I'm old enough to remember how quickly ALMSIVI Intervention could take us away from places like this.
string: 我已经老到记得母亲神干涉可以多快地让我们远离这样的地方。

original: I speak with the shopkeep and prices are TWICE what they are for you. Why is that?
string: 我跟店主交谈过，价格是你们的两倍。为什么？

original: Two hundred coin? No! I will not pay one coin more than fifty! Fetcher!
string: 两百金币？不行！我不会支付超过五十金币的费用！混蛋！

original: What do you think of this for the Temple display? No? I'll find something else.
string: 你认为庙宇展示用这个怎么样？不行吗？我会找其他东西。

original: Prices here are so expensive. The nerve of these people.
string: 这里的价格太贵了。这些人太无礼了。

original: I could make something better than that!
string: 我可以做得比那更好！

original: Mephala hide what I truly think about these shoddy goods.
string: 梅法拉隐藏了我对这些劣质商品的真实看法。

original: Be aware they put the oldest products in front. You need to dig around in the back to find the nice things.
string: 要知道他们把最老的产品放在最前面。你需要在后面翻找才能找到好东西。

original: I'll take two of these.
string: 我要拿两个这个。

original: I'm done shopping. Time to go.
string: 购物结束了。该走了。

original: I need some more time to finish shopping.
string: 我需要更多时间来完成购物。

original: Such abundance. In Morrowind even our central bazaars barely have this much on offer.
string: 如此丰富。在晨风，即使是我们的中央集市也很少提供这么多。

original: What do you think of this? No. It's no good.
string: 你觉得这个怎么样？不，不好。

original: I'm glad to be home.
string: 我很高兴能回家。

original: This place looks well maintained.
string: 这地方看起来是好好地维护过的。

original: Interesting decor.
string: 有趣的装饰。

original: We need more staff in this place. I certainly can't be bothered to sweep.
string: 我们需要更多的员工在这个地方。扫地我肯定办不到。

original: A well stocked bookshelf means a well cared for home.
string: 存货丰富的书架意味着家里得心疼。

original: I need to do a bit of enchanting, pardon me.
string: 我需要做一点附魔，见谅。

original: As Hand of Mephala, the largest bedroom is mine by seniority.
string: 作为梅法拉之手，最大的卧室就归我了。

original: Do you call this place home?
string: 你把这里称为家吗？

original: Hopefully we get some time here before we must head out again.
string: 希望在我们再次出发之前能在这里待一段时间。

original: This is a good place to rest and recuperate.
string: 这是一个好地方休息和康复。

original: No place is home like Bal Meryan.
string: 没有什么地方像巴尔莫兰那样像家。

original: One home is as good as another. Except Bal Meryan. That's much better.
string: 一个家和另一个家没什么区别。除了巴尔莫兰。那更好。

original: Traveling together has done wonders for my mood. Perhaps I can show you a few tricks and illusions as recompense?
string: 一起旅行对我的心情有很大的帮助。也许我可以展示给你一些戏法和幻术作为补偿？

original: I'm beginning to feel like my old self more and more as we journey. My blade training returns from the mental fog. Here, let me show you some things.
string: 随着我们的旅程，我越来越感觉回到了自己身上。我的剑术训练从思维迷雾中重新出现。来，让我向你展示一些东西。

original: I've been watching the way you move. Your steps and gait. If you adjust it like so, you might make less sound.
string: 我一直在看你走路的方式。你的步伐和步态。如果你调整得像这样，你可能会发出更小的声音。

original: May Mephala cloak you.
string: 愿梅法拉庇护你。

original: Walk in shadows.
string: 在阴影中行走。

original: Until later, ser'a.
string: 待会见，ser'a。

original: We part, for now.
string: 我们分开吧，暂时。

original: Farewell.
string: 再会。

original: Darkness bless you.
string: 黑暗保佑你。

original: Boethiah is watching you.
string: 波耶西亚在注视着你。

original: Until we meet again.
string: 待我们再次相遇。

original: Part as if every day is your last.
string: 分别就像每一天都是最后一天一样。

original: Linger not, for the ash wastes are ever shifting.
string: 不要逗留，因为火山灰荒原一直在变化。

original: May Red Mountain guide you.
string: 愿红山指引你。

original: Death will find you.
string: 死亡将会找到你。

original: Sorry for sneaking up on you. Hello.
string: 对不起，突然出现在你身边。你好。

original: Mephala blesses us on this meeting.
string: 梅法拉祝福我们在这次会面上。

original: Be still, for we meet not as enemies.
string: 保持安静，因为我们并非敌人相见。

original: The mists brought us together once more.
string: 雾再次把我们聚集在一起。

original: There is much to learn from each other.
string: 我们之间有很多可以相互学习的地方。

original: I greet you as friend.
string: 我把你当朋友问候。

original: What have the ash wastes brought me?
string: 不知道灰烬荒原给了我什么。

original: You may approach.
string: 你可以靠近了。

original: You are safe. For now.
string: 你现在是安全的。暂时的。

original: Hold your weapons men, we are speaking.
string: 保持武器，诸位，我们在讲话。

original: You have cause to speak?
string: 你有话要说？

original: I could snap you like a brittle branch.
string: 我可以像折断易碎的树枝一样弄死你。

original: Mephala claim their soul.
string: 梅法拉要求得到他们的灵魂。

original: Dead of course. Did you know them?
string: 当然是死了。你认识他们吗？

original: That could easily have been me. Perhaps tomorrow.
string: 那可能很容易让我上当。也许明天吧。

original: Every corpse adds to the turmoil of this land.
string: 每具尸体都增加了这片土地的动荡。

original: I'll just, go the other way then.
string: 那我就去另一个方向了。

original: Idiots. Can't they settle things more quietly?
string: 白痴们。他们不能更安静地解决问题吗？

original: We should slip around this mess and move on.
string: 我们应该绕过这个混乱，继续前进。

original: The fools wet their blades on each other.
string: 愚人湿着刀互相拼杀。

original: Swift and deadly, just as Mephala commands.
string: 迅猛而致命，正如梅法拉所吩咐的。

original: This blade is your doom!
string: 这把刀将是你的毁灭！

original: You will be dead soon!
string: 你很快就会死了！

original: I strike at you!
string: 我打击你！

original: This weapon is too heavy!
string: 这把武器太重了！

original: Give me something smaller, now!
string: 给我点小的，现在！

original: I can't cast spells with this weapon.
string: 使用这把武器我就无法施法了。

original: This is the weapon of a base brute.
string: 这是一个基地蛮子的武器。

original: A bow? Not the worst thing. Not the best.
string: 一把弓？不是最糟糕的。也不是最好的。

original: I suppose I will shoot them.
string: 我想我会开枪打他们。

original: I prefer to be close in, but this will do.
string: 我更喜欢近身搏斗，但这样也可以。

original: Stop. Moving.
string: 停下。别动了。

original: They'll never see me coming.
string: 他们永远看不到我来。

original: Fleeing? As they should.
string: 逃跑？他们应该这样做。

original: Annoying.
string: 真烦人。

original: Mephala approves, never stand and fight to your doom.
string: 梅芙拉认可，永远不要站着与命运抗争。

original: Good thing I'm patient.
string: 幸好我有耐心。

original: The hunt is on.
string: 狩猎开始了。

original: When I find you, it shall be swift!
string: 等我找到你，将会是迅速的！

original: My pursuit is tireless!
string: 我的追求是不懈的！

original: Coward!
string: 懦夫！

original: You flee? Pathetic.
string: 你逃了？可笑。

original: Meet your death.
string: 迎接你的死亡。

original: Mephala curse you!
string: 梅花拉诅咒你！

original: I strike at you!
string: 我打击你！

original: Take this, foe!
string: 拿着，敌人！

original: Ha!
string: 哈！

original: Hah!
string: 哈哈！

original: Aha!
string: 啊哈！

original: Death!
string: 死亡！

original: Bleed in silence!
string: 默默流血吧！

original: Die in shadow!
string: 在阴影中死去！

original: Boethiah comes for you!
string: 波耶西亚来找你了！

original: Die!
string: 去死吧！

original: I am your end!
string: 我就是你的终结！

original: Bleed!
string: 流血吧！

original: Haarg!
string: 哈啊！

original: Raah!
string: 啊！

original: I think I left a good impression with Delvin Mallory when I hid out there. If we're ever in Riften we should see him.
string: 我想我在躲藏在那里时给德尔文·马洛瑞留下了很好的印象。如果我们有机会到裂谷城，我们应该去见他。

original: I practice my archery daily. It is a skill that takes a lifetime to perfect, that can wither in but a few weeks.
string: 我每天都练习射箭。这是一项需要一生时间完善的技能，只需短短几周就会荒废。

original: There is little as pleasing as a perfectly placed shot down range.
string: 没有什么比远处完美的一击更令人满意的事情了。

original: I'm enjoying traveling together. Truly enjoying it.
string: 我很享受我们一起旅行。真的很享受。

original: Now that I'm not alone, I feel much safer.
string: 现在我不再孤独了，感觉安全多了。

original: If anyone comes for you, I'll be at your side.
string: 如果有人来找你，我会在你身边的。

original: I'll watch your behind. Your... back! Watching... it.
string: 我会守护你的背后。你的……背！在看…它。

original: Stay up front, ser'a. Gives me a good view.
string: 站在前面，ser'a。给我一个好视野。

original: I lost most of my friends that fateful day, but I'm making new ones. Like you.
string: 那个命运之日，我失去了大部分朋友，但我正在结交新朋友。例如你。

original: Azura teaches that lives, like days, come and go, and it is the moments in between that matter.
string: 阿祖拉教导我们，生命像日子一样来来去去，而介于其中的时刻才是重要的。

original: Do you have any ebony arrows? They're hard to find but they do shoot the straightest.
string: 你有黑檀箭吗？很难找，但射得最直。

original: Watch for berries. Any kind will do. I'm going to make some preserves later.
string: 注意采摘浆果。任何种类都可以。我稍后要制作果酱。

original: Juniper berries are quite bitter unless you leach them overnight in some water then strain the tannins.
string: 杜松子在不泡水过夜然后去除丹宁剂的情况下相当苦涩。

original: Jazbay can be washed and put straight into a jar.
string: 茄巴可以洗净直接放到罐子里。

original: If you put a little lavender in some soap, you'll smell wonderful all day long. That's what I do.
string: 如果你在肥皂里加一点薰衣草，你一整天都会闻起来很好。我就是这样做的。

original: I wonder if we could plant some sweetgrass and marshmarrow back home? Doubt we'll find any.
string: 我在想我们能不能在家里种些甜草和沼泽藤蔓？我怀疑我们找不到。

original: There's nothing better than fresh sheets and some plump pillows. These Nords sleep far too roughly.
string: 没有什么比新床单和松软的枕头更好的了。这些诺德人睡得太粗暴了。

original: Drelyra has been trying to get me to write some poetry but I don't think I'm clever enough.
string: 德莉拉一直试图让我写一些诗，但我觉得我不够聪明。

original: The others don't like Selvoneth much. But I do. She has a good heart, under the icy exterior.
string: 其他人并不太喜欢赛尔沃内斯。但我喜欢她。在这冷冰冷外表下，她有一颗善良的心。

original: Nindasu failed as our leader. She's still the Hand of Mephala but she'll never be Mother of the Order again.
string: 妮达苏作为我们的领导失败了。她仍然是梅法拉之手，但她再也不会是这个教团的母亲了。

original: Dela... sorry, 'Ardela', is quite handsome don't you think?
string: 德拉…抱歉，‘阿尔黛拉’，你不觉得她很帅吗？

original: Dressa. I mean Vendressa, what a good friend to me. We roomed together her first ten years at Bal Meryan.
string: 丽莎。我是说温德丽莎，她对我是一个很好的朋友。她在巴尔莫兰的头十年我们一起住。

original: If we have to climb another one of those mountains, my legs will turn to jelly.
string: 如果我们不得不再爬一座那样的山，我的腿会软得像果冻一样。

original: If we see a sabertooth don't hurt it! I want to try taming one.
string: 如果我们看到剑齿虎，不要伤害它！我想尝试驯服一个。

original: Dogs were once wolves. Did you know that? I bet I could teach a wolf to be a dog.
string: 狗曾经是狼。你知道吗？我敢打赌我可以教会一只狼变成狗。

original: Bears are so cute. Big, and fluffy, and friendly. At least to me, but not so friendly to you it seems.
string: 熊们真可爱。又大又毛茸茸，又友好。至少对我是这样，但看起来对你不太友好。

original: I wish Bal Meryan didn't have a "no animals inside" rule. Perhaps you could speak to Drelyra and Nindasu about that for me?
string: 我希望巴尔莫兰没有“禁止携带动物”的规定。也许你可以替我向德莉拉和妮达苏反映一下？

original: Ever ride a guar? They're so clumsy, and they're slower than horses.
string: 骑过奎尔吗？它们如此笨拙，比马慢。

original: So, do I get paid ever? Seems like all the gold goes into your pockets. I'm not judging or anything.
string: 那么，我什么时候才会得到报酬？看起来所有的金都进了你的口袋。我没有评判或其他任何意思。

original: Isn't there a Monastery out here somewhere, built way up on the tallest mountain?
string: 这附近是不是有一座修道院建在最高的山上？

original: Hard to see anything in this rain.
string: 在这场雨中很难看清任何东西。

original: Rain means bad visibility and loose bowstrings, a horrible combination for me.
string: 下雨意味着能见度低和弓弦松弛，这对我来说是个可怕的组合。

original: We should find somewhere to wait out this rain.
string: 我们应该找个地方躲过这场雨。

original: Everything is so muddy in this rain. I hate it.
string: 雨天里一切都变得泥泞。我讨厌这样。

original: Are you cold? I'm cold. Let's warm up.
string: 你冷吗？我冷。让我们暖和一下吧。

original: Better cover up all your books and notes. Don't want them getting soggy.
string: 最好把你的书和笔记都遮起来。不想让它们变湿了。

original: Have you ever noticed that rain has a different taste in different places?
string: 你是否注意到不同地方的雨水有着不同的味道？

original: In Morrowind the rain is mud even before it hits the ground.
string: 在《上古卷轴5：天际》的晨风中，雨滴落地前已经变成了泥浆。

original: Look at how the snow sparkles!
string: 看看雪花闪耀的样子！

original: Snowball! ... Nice dodge.
string: 雪球！……躲得好。

original: -hums happily- Fresh snow makes me feel alive.
string: -快乐地哼唱着- 新雪让我感觉活力四射。

original: -shivers- We might want to get inside and warm up.
string: -发抖- 我们最好回去室内暖和一下。

original: Falling snow and spiced wine, what's not to like?
string: 落雪和香料酒，有什么不好？

original: Think we can stop by a campfire or kitchen so I can heat up some spiced wine?
string: 想不想找个篝火或厨房，我热一壶香料酒？

original: All this snow makes me want to go curl up with a book and some warm clothes.
string: 所有这些雪让我想卷缩在一本书和一些温暖的衣服中。

original: Do you like snow too? It's so pretty.
string: 你也喜欢雪吗？雪太美了。

original: I can see all the way to the horizon!
string: 我可以看到一直延伸到地平线！

original: It's such a beautiful day!
string: 今天天气真好！

original: Got a good lookout on whatever's coming our way.
string: 在我们即将面对的一切事物上有一个很好的前哨。

original: Days like this make me love being outside.
string: 像这样的时光让我热爱户外生活。

original: Is this your favorite kind of weather too?
string: 这种天气是你最喜欢的吗？

original: It's the perfect weather for a night trip! Where are we going?
string: 这是进行夜间出行的完美天气！我们要去哪里？

original: Morrowind never gets nights as gorgeous as this.
string: 晨风从未有过如此美丽的夜晚。

original: Ever wonder if the stars are glimmers of hope, or glimmers of sadness?
string: 你有没有想过星星是希望的闪光，还是悲伤的闪光？

original: Hiding? Good plan.
string: 躲藏？好计划。

original: They'll never see us coming.
string: 他们永远也不会看出我们的到来。

original: Great idea. Let's set an ambush.
string: 好主意。让我们设个伏击。

original: Shh. We're being quiet.
string: 嘘。我们要保持安静。

original: I'd love a muffle potion right about now.
string: 现在我真想要一个隐形药水。

original: Lets slip in unnoticed.
string: 让我们悄无声息地溜进去。

original: Oh your poor back.
string: 哦，你的脊背可真不舒服。

original: Please, let me carry some of that.
string: 请让我帮你拿一些。

original: You should share the load. I don't mind.
string: 你应该分担负荷。我不介意。

original: I can take some of those things off you.
string: 我可以帮你卸掉一些东西。

original: We should find a place to sell off our extra stuff.
string: 我们应该找个地方卖掉多余的东西。

original: Maybe we should swing by home and drop off some of that stuff.
string: 也许我们应该先回家，把一些东西放下。

original: I'm not sure how much use I'll be down here.
string: 我不确定我在这里能派上多大用场。

original: I might need to switch to my sword.
string: 也许我需要换上剑了。

original: Anything could be around that next corner!
string: 下一个转角可能隐藏着任何东西！

original: Watch out for floor traps!
string: 小心地面陷阱！

original: Think there's treasure in this place?
string: 觉得这个地方有宝藏？

original: Make sure to pick up all the wine as we go along. Hate to waste it.
string: 确保我们一路上把所有的葡萄酒都带上。浪费实在太可惜了。

original: Keep a look out for treasure chests.
string: 留意宝箱。

original: Probably some nasty foes down here.
string: 这里可能有一些凶恶的敌人。

original: We might want to be quiet and careful.
string: 我们可能需要保持安静小心。

original: If you see any books make sure to grab them. Hate to leave them to the mold and dust.
string: 如果看到任何书籍，请务必拿起它们。真不愿意让它们留给霉菌和尘埃。

original: I prefer the open air, myself.
string: 我更喜欢呼吸新鲜空气。

original: What's your plan in here?
string: 你在这里有什么计划？

original: I hate killing animals!
string: 我恨杀动物！

original: I wonder if there are any baby animals in here? If you find one, we should keep it.
string: 我想知道这里有没有小动物？如果找到了，我们应该留下它。

original: I can skin whatever we find, by the way.
string: 我们发现什么就剥了吧，顺便。

original: Bit difficult to use my bow in here.
string: 在这种地方用弓有点困难。

original: I'm not happy with these close quarters.
string: 我对这种拥挤的空间感到不高兴。

original: I love animals, but sometimes what must be done, must be done.
string: 我喜欢动物，但有时候必须要做的事情，必须要做。

original: I bet the inn here has a nice toasty fire.
string: 我打赌这里的客栈有一个温暖舒适的火。

original: Think there's a bard around here anywhere?
string: 这附近有吟游诗人吗？

original: If there's a local tavern, we should stop by.
string: 如果有当地的酒馆，我们应该顺道去一下。

original: Mind swinging by a blacksmith's shoppe? I could use some arrows.
string: 顺便进一家铁匠铺吗？我需要一些箭。

original: We should check with whoever's in charge of this lovely town and see if they have any jobs for us.
string: 我们应该去找找谁是这个可爱小镇的负责人，看看他们是否有工作给我们做。

original: This place seems vibrant and busy. I like it.
string: 这地方似乎充满活力和繁忙。我喜欢。

original: I bet the mayor of this place has some tasks for us. What, they don't have mayors here? ... Chief then? Lord Commander?
string: 我打赌这个地方的市长有一些任务给我们做。什么，这里没有市长吗？……首席吗？指挥官领主？

original: I liked Riften but this place is much nicer.
string: 我喜欢裂谷城，但这个地方更漂亮。

original: Think this town's wine is any good?
string: 这个镇上的葡萄酒好喝吗？

original: Mind checking the stalls for some Firebrand Wine?
string: 帮忙看一下摊位上有没有“火焰之盾酒”？

original: If you see a beggar and don't give them gold, I won't talk to you for a week.
string: 如果你看到一个乞丐不给他们金币，我一个星期不和你说话。

original: Make sure to say hello to any children you see. They usually get ignored but it brightens their day if you greet them.
string: 记得和看到的孩子打招呼。他们通常被忽视，但如果你和他们打招呼，会让他们一天更开心。

original: Anything catch your eye?
string: 有什么引起了你的注意吗？

original: I always spend all my coin on trinkets and have nothing left for essentials.
string: 我总是把所有的钱都花在小玩意儿上，没有留下什么东西来买必需品。

original: Do you think this is worth the price?
string: 你认为这值得这个价位吗？

original: I've looked through everything. We can go whenever you are done.
string: 我已经看了一遍所有的东西。你完成后我们就可以出发。

original: Please give me some time to look through the wares.
string: 请给我一些时间浏览商品。

original: They have so many nice things here!
string: 这里有这么多好东西！

original: I love shopping!
string: 我喜欢购物！

original: Oh, I love that! Can't afford it.
string: 哦，我喜欢那个！买不起。

original: Can you buy this for me please? I'll pay you back with a hug.
string: 能买这个给我吗？我会用一个拥抱还你的。

original: Can I borrow some gold please?
string: 可以借我一些金子吗？

original: Dela would love this. I'm getting it for her!
string: **黛拉**一定会喜欢这个。我为她弄来的！

original: Oh! I just have to buy this for Dressa.
string: 哦！我必须为德瑞莎买这个。

original: We're home! Let me slip into something more comfortable.
string: 我们回家了！让我换上更舒适的衣服。

original: I love getting back from a cold journey to sit by a toasty fire.
string: 我喜欢从寒冷的旅程中归来，坐在一个温暖的火边。

original: Do you love being home as much as I do?
string: 你像我一样热爱家吗？

original: Hope we have some Firebrand Wine!
string: 希望我们有一些烈焰红葡萄酒！

original: What do we have to drink around here?
string: 这里有什么喝的吗？

original: I'm a bit of a homebody. I don't mind traveling but I do prefer sticking close to the Monastery.
string: 我有点喜欢宅在家里。我不介意旅行，但我更喜欢靠近修道院。

original: Why don't we stay here for a while and relax?
string: 我们为什么不在这里待一会儿放松一下呢？

original: I hope there's a baking oven around here somewhere.
string: 我希望这附近有一个烘烤炉。

original: Shall I make us something to eat?
string: 我给我们做些吃的吗？

original: Who decorated in here? They did a great job!
string: 谁在这里装饰的？他们做得很棒！

original: Such a lovely home.
string: 如此可爱的家。

original: Time to curl up around the fire with a good book.
string: 是时候围着火坐下读本好书了。

original: Swamps and wetlands are true bounties, filled with wonderful ingredients.
string: 沼泽地和湿地都是真正丰富的，充满了美妙的食材。

original: There is always a useful ingredient to find, if you know where to look.
string: 总是可以找到一个有用的成分，只要你知道在哪找。

original: Even in the cold of the Pale, there are useful ingredients to be found.
string: 即使在贫瘠之地的寒冷中，也可以找到有用的成分。

original: Just because Winterhold is a frozen landscape doesn't make it bereft of useful reagents.
string: 冬堡是一个冰封的风景，不代表它缺乏有用的药材。

original: The volcanic tundra has many amazing plants we can use for alchemical purposes.
string: 火山冻土上有许多神奇的植物，我们可以用于炼金目的。

original: The aspen groves and gentle vales of this hold have many treasures to harvest.
string: 此领地的白杨林和温和的山谷有许多宝藏可供收获。

original: The tundra is just filled with useful ingredients, waiting to be plucked.
string: 冻土地到处都是有用的配料，等待被采摘。

original: The crags and canyons of the Reach hide many bounties. Fortunately for us, I know what plants are useful.
string: 萨日克的峭壁和峡谷隐藏着许多财宝。幸运的是，我知道哪些植物有用。

original: As you'd expect, the forest is rich with useful reagents and ingredients.
string: 森林里充满了有用的药材和原料，这不出所料。

original: Solstheim has many unique reagents that cannot be found elsewhere.
string: 索瑟海姆拥有许多独特的炼金材料，在其他地方是找不到的。

original: I'll talk to you later.
string: 我待会再和你说话。

original: Goodbye friend.
string: 再见朋友。

original: Guess I'll drink alone.
string: 我想我会一个人喝酒。

original: Hope you're back soon.
string: 希望你很快回来。

original: Reclamations watch over you.
string: 复苏守护你。

original: I hate saying goodbyes.
string: 我讨厌说再见。

original: Why, hello again.
string: 哦，你好。

original: Hello, do you need something?
string: 你好，你需要什么吗？

original: Greetings, friend. Are you well?
string: 问候，朋友。你还好吗？

original: I feel blessed to see you again.
string: 很荣幸再次见到你。

original: Oh? Don't mind me, I was a bit distracted. Hello.
string: 哦？别介意我，我有点分心。你好。

original: It gladdens me to see you.
string: 见到你我很高兴。

original: That's sad. I wonder if they had a family.
string: 真是令人难过。不知道他们是否有家人。

original: I hate to see so much death.
string: 我不喜欢看到这么多死亡。

original: Dead things smell. So. Bad.
string: 死物有恶臭。太。糟糕了。

original: Let's just keep going. Someone else can loot the bodies.
string: 我们继续前进吧。其他人可以搜刮尸体。

original: I could shoot a few arrows into that mess and they'd never notice.
string: 我可以向那团混乱射几支箭，他们根本不会注意到。

original: A fight! Such brutes!
string: 一场战斗！真是些蛮混蛮闹的家伙！

original: I'd rather not get involved.
string: 我宁愿不参与。

original: What are they doing? Are they fighting?
string: 他们在做什么？他们在打架吗？

original: I'm skilled with a blade too!
string: 我也精于使用剑！

original: Swapping to melee!
string: 切换到近战！

original: Get them off me!
string: 保护我！

original: I hate close quarter fights.
string: 我讨厌近身战斗。

original: This is what I'm best at!
string: 这是我的拿手好戏！

original: One clean shot is all I need!
string: 只要一击需要清洗！

original: Aiming for the heart.
string: 目标是心脏。

original: Aiming for the head.
string: 瞄准头部。

original: Get out of the way so I can shoot them!
string: 让开，让我来射杀他们！

original: Deadra guide my aim!
string: 迪德拉引导我的瞄准！

original: Excuse me, keep my shooting line clear!
string: 打扰一下，请让我射击线路畅通！

original: Watch out, arrows downrange!
string: 小心，箭矢射来！

original: Running? Can't outrun arrows!
string: 逃跑？无法逃过箭！

original: I don't need to get close to use my bow!
string: 我不需要靠近即可使用我的弓！

original: Maybe I should just let you go?
string: 也许我应该就此放你走？

original: Good! Run off!
string: 好！快逃！

original: Running is better than death, I suppose.
string: 逃跑总比死亡要好，我猜。

original: I'll catch you soon enough!
string: 我很快就会抓到你！

original: Take this!
string: 接招吧！

original: Ash take you!
string: 愿灰屑将你带走！

original: Hold still!
string: 别动！

original: Aha!
string: 啊哈！

original: Haha!
string: 哈哈！

original: Azura guide me!
string: 阿祖拉指引我！

original: I see you!
string: 我看到你了！

original: Oh!
string: 哦！

original: Watch out!
string: 当心！

original: Careful!
string: 小心！

original: We should climb to the highest peaks, so that I might find sites of frozen power.
string: 我们应该爬到最高峰，这样我就可以找到被冻结力量的遗址。

original: I always hoped to see the lands on the other side of the Velothi Mountains. I am disappointed.
string: 我一直希望看到维洛斯山脉另一边的土地。我很失望。

original: Your silent presence is uninspiring. Read me a poem or something, s'wit.
string: 你无声的存在令人无所适从。给我读一首诗或者什么东西，傻瓜。

original: What does s'wit mean you ask? It's not actually a Dunmer word, it's a contraction for "slow wit".
string: 你问s'wit是什么意思？其实这不是一个丹莫语词汇，而是“slow wit”的缩写。

original: When I call you a s'wit know I mean it as a term of endearment. But if I YELL s'wit at someone, it's an insult.
string: 当我称你为“蠢货”时，我是以一种亲昵的方式称呼你的。但如果我对着某人大喊“蠢货”，那就是一种侮辱。

original: I could summon other kinds of atronachs of course, but I prefer my sturdy ice bulwarks.
string: 我当然可以召唤其他种类的侍灵，但我更喜欢我的坚固的冰坚壁。

original: Calling an atronach is the ultimate sign of mastery over the Firmament, or of favor from the Daedra.
string: 召唤一个侍灵是对天穹的终极掌控，亦或是对迪德拉的宠爱。

original: Atronachs are not beholden to any specific Daedra, but may serve freely.
string: 阿托拉克不受任何特定的迪德拉所束缚，但可以自由服务。

original: I've tried to call Aureals and Mazken quite a few times, to no avail.
string: 我尝试过多次打电话给晶体族和玛岑，但没有成功。

original: I respect all three Reclamations equally. What I truly revere is power.
string: 我同等尊敬三位重生者。我真正崇敬的是力量。

original: Knowledge is power, yes. But power is also power.
string: 知识就是力量，是的。但力量也是力量。

original: The execution of power matters more than its amassing. It is there to use, not be hoarded.
string: 行使权力的方式比积累更重要。权力是用来使用的，而不是囤积的。

original: We must be swift in our decisions, like the storm or the blizzard sweeping away old thought.
string: 我们必须在决策上迅速，就像暴风雨或暴风雪席卷走旧思想一样。

original: Sometimes the other women in my Order call me indecisive, but I'm very decisive. Just about different things on different days.
string: 我修会中的其他女人有时会说我犹豫不决，但我其实很果断。只是每天对不同的事情都很果断。

original: Traveling with you has not been as horrid as I expected.
string: 和你一起旅行并没有我预期的那么可怕。

original: Your silence is pleasing. Continue to tramp about and get hit for me, my little s'wit.
string: 你的沉默令人满意。继续四处走动，替我挨打，我的小粗鲁家伙。

original: See that path in the distance? Let's find out where it leads.
string: 看到远处的那条小路了吗？让我们看看它通向哪里。

original: I'm bored. Let's kill the next person we meet and spill their blood on the thirsty ground.
string: 我无聊了。让我们干掉下一个遇到的人，让他们的鲜血浸透这片口渴的土地。

original: We need to liven up this journey. The next bandit we kill, we take their corpse and prop it in an amusing position for others to see.
string: 我们需要让这段旅程更有趣。下一个我们杀死的强盗，我们就把他们的尸体摆成一个有趣的姿势给别人看。

original: I'm trying to read and walk but it is very difficult. Perhaps a palanquin for me?
string: 我试图边走边看书，但这很困难。也许应该找人抬轿子给我？

original: Don't feel singled out by my insults. I spread them about to everyone equally.
string: 不要觉得我在挑衅你。我对所有人都一视同仁。

original: Why are you always running about? Stop and walk for a while.
string: 你为什么总是四处奔波？停下来，慢慢走一会儿吧。

original: All this travel has ruined my hem. I'll have to get Drelyra to repair it.
string: 这么多旅行把我的裙子弄脏了。我得让德莉拉修一修。

original: If you're going to drag me across half of Tamriel, please buy me some good traveling clothes along the way.
string: 如果你要把我拽遍泰姆瑞尔半个，请路上给我买些好的旅行服饰。

original: Do you ever sleep? I myself need at least ten hours a night.
string: 你睡觉吗？我自己每晚至少需要睡十个小时。

original: My blood-sister Drelyra and I are not much alike, but we respect each other.
string: 我和我的血妹德莉拉并不太相似，但我们彼此尊重。

original: Ruveni is very sweet. Just between you and I, we might have been a bit of a rumor.
string: 鲁文妮非常可爱。只告诉你，我们可能已经传播了一些谣言。

original: I think Nindasu is an excellent leader, and would gladly support her as Mother should she seek to lead again.
string: 我认为妮达苏是一位出色的领导人，如果她想再次担任母亲，我将乐意支持她。

original: Vendressa never quite fit in with the others. She always has her own plans and schemes.
string: 芬德雷萨从来没有完全融入其中。她总是有自己的计划和诡计。

original: Ardela likes to think she protects me, but it is really me just humoring her.
string: 阿尔黛拉喜欢认为她在保护我，但其实只是我在讨好她。

original: Snow! My favorite weather.
string: 雪！我最喜欢的天气。

original: I do love the snow. It does inspire me so.
string: 我真的喜欢雪。它让我感到灵感无限。

original: Don't you like the snow? I think it's wonderful.
string: 你不喜欢雪吗？我觉得它很美好。

original: Finally, some good weather. Snow.
string: 终于好天气了。下雪了。

original: My connection to the elements is stronger in this weather.
string: 在这种天气下，我和元素之间的联系更加强烈。

original: I feel my spells shift slightly, become a bit more empowered when they reflect their surroundings.
string: 我感觉我的法术有了些微变化，当它们映射周围环境时变得更有力量。

original: Smell that? Crisp ozone. Snow now and a storm coming soon.
string: 闻到了吗？清新的臭氧味。现在下雪了，很快就要下暴风雪了。

original: I don't ever get cold in this weather. I've always been that way.
string: 在这种天气下我绝不会感到冷。我一直都是这样。

original: You're doing the crouching thing.
string: 你在蹲着。

original: They can still see us you know.
string: 他们仍然能看到我们。

original: Atronachs don't crouch, by the way.
string: 侍灵不会蹲下，顺便说一下。

original: -whispering loudly- Why are we hiding?
string: -大声低语-我们为什么要藏起来？

original: Is it time for my tragically bad stealth? I'm sure this will go well.
string: 是时候展示我那令人遗憾的低级潜行技巧了吗？我相信这次会顺利的。

original: Your Hide and Ambush plan is far less likely to be successful than Atronach and Attack.
string: 你们的躲藏和伏击计划远不如侍灵和进攻的计划成功。

original: Don't load that junk up on me.
string: 不要把那些垃圾都给我载上。

original: Have enough random clutter there?
string: 这里有足够的随机杂乱物品吗？

original: You're akin to a very slow pack guar right now.
string: 你现在就像是一只非常慢的行李瓜儿。

original: Why did you pick all that up?
string: 你为什么捡起了那些东西？

original: Drop some of that already!
string: 掉了一些东西吧！

original: You'd better not try to foist that junk off on me.
string: 你最好别试图把这些垃圾推销给我。

original: It's a bit dank in here.
string: 这里有点潮湿。

original: I can hardly see anything.
string: 我几乎什么都看不见。

original: Smells like mold and desperation.
string: 闻起来像是霉味和绝望。

original: There's probably some nice treasure down here. Makes it worth the delve.
string: 这里可能有一些不错的珍宝。这让挖掘变得值得。

original: All this traipsing about had better make us quite wealthy.
string: 所有这种闲逛最好让我们变得很富有。

original: Remember, I get a half share of whatever we find.
string: 记住，我们找到的东西我分一半。

original: I don't think any of my Sisters save Nindasu would actually like this place.
string: 我觉得我的姐妹们中除了楠达苏，其他人都不会喜欢这个地方。

original: There's probably some foes ahead. I'll let you go first.
string: 前方可能有敌人。我先让你去。

original: I cannot wait to get out of this place.
string: 我迫不及待要离开这里。

original: We should finish our task quickly, and leave here.
string: 我们应该快点完成任务，离开这里。

original: I'd rather be home, reading.
string: 我宁愿回家读书。

original: Why do you insist on constantly coming to such places?
string: 你为什么一直坚持到这样的地方来呢？

original: Time to kill some ragged little beasts.
string: 是时候杀一些破烂的小家伙了。

original: You can root about in their rancid corpses. I'll just kill them.
string: 你可以搜索他们腐败的尸体。我只会杀死他们。

original: It smells terrible in here.
string: 这里闻起来太可怕了。

original: How did you get me to come in here, anyways?
string: 你究竟如何让我进来的呢？

original: We should leave this fetid place as soon as possible.
string: 我们应该尽快离开这肮脏的地方。

original: You really know how to show me a good time. S'wit.
string: 你真懂得如何让我度过愉快的时光。混蛋。

original: I need to pick up some Magicka potions while we are here.
string: 我们在这里需要买一些魔法药水。

original: If we swing by a tavern, it had better not be a low brow meadhall.
string: 如果我们去一家酒馆，最好不要是一个低贱的酒馆。

original: My life. My life for a bookstore.
string: 我的生活。我的生命只为一家书店。

original: Shall we drop by the magical goods shoppe? Or as the Nord s'wits call it, the Court Mage?
string: 我们要不要去魔法商品店？或像北方蠢货们称呼的那样，法师庭？

original: That armor makes you look quite wide. We should get you something new.
string: 那套甲让你看起来很宽。我们应该给你找些新的。

original: If you load us up on meaningless tasks from the bounty board, I'm leaving.
string: 如果你继续让我们完成悬赏板上毫无意义的任务，我就走了。

original: The steward probably has some idiotic request for us. Let's avoid him.
string: 总管可能有一些愚蠢的请求给我们。我们还是避开他吧。

original: Finally, some place with civilization. Is this... really civilization though?
string: 终于有文明的地方了。但这...真的算是文明吗？

original: I bet the local wines and ales are terrible.
string: 我敢打赌当地的葡萄酒和啤酒很糟糕。

original: Look at all these slack-jawed locals.
string: 看这些呆滞的本地人。

original: I'm finding a bakery. I need my sweetrolls.
string: 我在找面包店。我需要我的甜面包。

original: -quietly- Know of a place to get skooma hereabouts?
string: -轻声- 附近有地方可以搞到斯古马吗？

original: I'm getting this. You're paying. You don't have a choice in the matter.
string: 我要这个。你付钱。你别无选择。

original: This is expensive. I want it.
string: 这太贵了。我想要。

original: I suppose I should get this for Drelyra. She'd like it.
string: 我想德莉拉会喜欢这个。

original: If I kill the shopkeep, the goods are free, correct?
string: 如果我杀了店主，货物就免费了，对吗？

original: What do you mean, no Daedra summoning in the shop?
string: 什么？店里不能召唤迪德拉？

original: They'd better give me half price, or I'll summon an angry Frost Atronach.
string: 最好给我半价，不然我会召来一只愤怒的冰霜元素。

original: This trinket is acceptable. I'm getting it.
string: 这个饰品是可以接受的。我要它。

original: What a pathetic selection.
string: 多么可悲的选择。

original: Hand me your coin purse, I found a few things I want.
string: 把你的钱包交出来，我找到了一些我想要的东西。

original: I don't like anything here. Let's go.
string: 我不喜欢这里任何东西。咱们走吧。

original: Can you find anything worth purchasing here?
string: 在这里能找到值得购买的东西吗？

original: I grudgingly admit their selection is better than in Morrowind.
string: 我勉强承认他们的选择比晨风的好。

original: Finally. Time to relax.
string: 终于。是时候放松了。

original: Now I can catch up on some reading.
string: 现在我可以赶上一些阅读了。

original: I hope we have some Shein lying about.
string: 希望我们还有一些舍因。

original: I need a good book, some comfortable pillows, and plenty of time alone.
string: 我需要一本好书，一些舒适的枕头，以及充裕的独处时间。

original: Perhaps you can head out on the next excursion without me.
string: 也许你可以在下一次探险中不带我走。

original: I'd like to stay here a while.
string: 我想在这里呆一会儿。

original: Maybe leave me home this time? I have a lot of research to catch up on.
string: 也许这次别带我了？我有很多研究工作要追赶。

original: I'd better see to my letters. Who knows how long it is until you take us tromping off again.
string: 我最好看看我的信。谁知道你什么时候再带我们出去。

original: I require two sweetrolls, some Shein, and time to myself.
string: 我需要两个甜面包，一些希因和独自的时间。

original: Bothering me for a reason? This is my personal time.
string: 打扰我有什么理由？现在是我私人时间。

original: I'd better check up on my plants.
string: 我最好去查看一下我的植物。

original: If we stay away too long who waters all the plants?
string: 我们长时间不在，是谁给所有植物浇水的呢？

original: It's neither raining nor snowing. Now is the time to travel.
string: 现在既不下雨也不下雪。现在正是旅行的时候。

original: On days like this I can see straight to my next victim.
string: 像今天这样的日子，我可以直接看到下一个受害者。

original: I can feel the sun bearing down on my skin. How oppressive.
string: 我感觉到阳光灼热在我的皮肤上。多么压迫人心。

original: I'll let you keep in the lead. Since anything can see us from however far away, they'll go for you first.
string: 我让你带头吧。因为任何东西都可能从远处看到我们，它们会先袭击你。

original: It is quite clear tonight. A wonderful night to hunt our foes.
string: 今晚非常明朗。是个绝佳的夜晚去猎杀我们的敌人。

original: I wonder if it's a clear night in Oblivion.
string: 我想知道在湮灭里是否有个晴朗的夜晚。

original: Did you ever stop to think, maybe the atronachs I summon are pulled across the Firmament from one of those far stars?
string: 你有没有想过，也许我召唤的元素灵是从那些遥远的星星之一穿越星宇而来的？

original: See that star right there, the bright blue one? That's north.
string: 看到那颗星星了吗，那颗明亮的蓝色的？那就是北方。

original: Rain and storms help me draw power from the elements.
string: 雨水和风暴帮助我从元素中汲取力量。

original: I don't mind the cold, but the wet bothers me.
string: 我不介意寒冷，但潮湿会让我不舒服。

original: Perhaps we can travel when it is not raining?
string: 也许我们可以在不下雨的时候出发？

original: Out in the rain are we? How intelligent of you.
string: 你到外面的雨中了吗？你真聪明。

original: At least this rain isn't picking up ash on its way down.
string: 至少这雨下起来不会带走灰烬。

original: I'm glad I keep my hair short, or it'd be a soggy mess.
string: 我很高兴我把头发剪短了，否则它会是一个湿乎乎的一团糟。

original: Tromping about in the rain and mud again, are we?
string: 雨天和泥泞中蹭来蹭去，是吗？

original: Perhaps we can venture out... a different day.
string: 也许我们可以在...另一天冒险。

original: Good riddance.
string: 终于解脱了。

original: Begone.
string: 滚开。

original: Enough prattle, begone.
string: 废话够多了，滚吧。

original: May the Daedra watch over you.
string: 愿众神庇佑你。

original: Have a platitude about parting.
string: 谈谈分别的陈词。

original: Parting makes me glad.
string: 分别让我感到高兴。

original: What do you want?
string: 你要什么？

original: You speak with a Sister-Sorceress of the Order of the Ashen Veil.
string: 你在与灰纱修会的姊妹巫师交谈。

original: I suppose I should say something rather than ignore you.
string: 我想我应该说点什么，而不是无视你。

original: What is it? I'm busy.
string: 怎么了？我正忙着呢。

original: Greetings. Now speak up.
string: 问候。现在讲话。

original: I thought I was rid of you.
string: 我以为我已经摆脱了你。

original: Better them than me.
string: 不如让他们去吧。

original: A pity. They look like they could have been a useful thrall.
string: 有些遗憾。他们看起来本来可以成为一个有用的奴隶。

original: All death is sacred.
string: 所有的死亡都是神圣的。

original: It gladdens me to see this. Your work?
string: 看到这一切让我感到高兴。这是你的工作吗？

original: How droll. They're fighting.
string: 多么无聊。他们在打架。

original: A few ice spikes will silence the whole lot of them.
string: 几根冰刺将让他们一路安静下来。

original: A fight? I have better things to do.
string: 打架？我有更重要的事要做。

original: You idiots! No strategy at all!
string: 你们这些白痴！毫无策略可言！

original: I need more magicka!
string: 我需要更多魔法！

original: Get these fetchers off me!
string: 让这些猎犬离开我！

original: They're too close!
string: 他们太靠近了！

original: Atronachs, protect me!
string: 灵体，保护我！

original: I'll just swing this tree trunk then.
string: 我就把这树干挥一挥。

original: Whose idea was this weapon?
string: 这把武器是谁的主意？

original: This is a stupid weapon. I hate it.
string: 这是个愚蠢的武器。我讨厌它。

original: I'm no barbarian! I'm a sorceress!
string: 我不是野蛮人！我是一个女术士！

original: I hope this is a jest. A bow?
string: 希望这是玩笑。一弓箭？

original: Useless bow.
string: 无用的弓。

original: What fetcher gave me this bow?
string: 是哪个缚魂者给了我这支弓？

original: I should not have a bow.
string: 我不应该拿着弓箭。

original: Atronachs, pursue!
string: 侍灵，追击！

original: You can run, but like the glacier I shall grind you down!
string: 你可以逃，但就像冰川一样，我会将你消磨掉！

original: Fetcher outran my blizzard.
string: 奉命者跑得比我的暴风雪还快。

original: Better summon an atronach to cut you off!
string: 最好召唤一个阿特洛纳克来拦住你！

original: Coward! Are you afraid of me?
string: 懦夫！你怕我吗？

original: See how they run!
string: 看他们跑！

original: Die by ice!
string: 死在冰上！

original: Feel the blizzard!
string: 感受暴风雪！

original: Freeze!
string: 冻住！

original: Die!
string: 去死吧！

original: Atronachs, attack!
string: 侍灵，攻击！

original: Get them, minions!
string: 抓住他们，手下！

original: Run, or die!
string: 逃跑，否则就会死！

original: Ha!
string: 哈！

original: Fool!
string: 傻瓜！

original: S'wit!
string: 蠢货！

original: A bit frigid today is it not? And the rain...
string: 今天有点寒冷，是吧？还有雨......

original: It's a bit rainy, but that'll help us close in with our foes.
string: 天气有点雨，但这会帮助我们接近敌人。

original: Ruvi hates this weather, hard for her to see anything down range.
string: 鲁维讨厌这种天气，她很难看清远处的任何事物。

original: Worst part about the rain? Muddy boots.
string: 下雨最烦的地方？泥泞的靴子。

original: We see some bandits, I'm killing them and taking their fire to get warm from this downpour.
string: 我们看到一些强盗，我杀死他们并拿着他们的火保暖，以躲避这场倾盆大雨。

original: In Morrowind the rain is like hot blood pouring from the sky. Here? Not so much.
string: 在晨风降下的雨像是从天空中流出的热血。但这里呢？并没有那样。

original: Did you ever stop and think, maybe the rain is the tears of all the dead, pouring back down to Nirn?
string: 你有没有想过，或许雨是所有死者的眼泪，倾泻到了尼恩上？

original: It's not the time for travels, it's raining a bit too much.
string: 现在不是旅行的时候，雨下得太厉害了。

original: It's too nice out. They'll see us coming.
string: 天气太好了。他们会看见我们过来的。

original: It's so bright out. My head. Maybe I hit the skooma too hard last night.
string: 外面太亮了。我的脑袋。也许我昨晚药物服用太过度了。

original: Do you have anything for a hangover? It's so bright out today...
string: 你有什么可以治疗宿醉的东西吗？今天阳光如此灼热……

original: -digs around in her pack- Damn. I forgot my sun goggles at home.
string: -在她的背包里翻找着- 哎呀。我把太阳镜忘在家里了。

original: Now this is a night to be outside!
string: 现在是个外出的好晚上！

original: I bet we could tie ourselves to a giant lantern and just float all the way up to the stars.
string: 我打赌我们可以把自己捆在巨大的灯笼上，顺着漂浮去天上。

original: Odd question. Which do you prefer, Masser or Secundas? I like Masser because it reminds me of blood.
string: 奇怪的问题。你更喜欢纳瑟还是塞昆达？我喜欢纳瑟，因为它让我想起了鲜血。

original: It's a good night for Boethiah's work.
string: 这是进行波耶西亚工作的好夜晚。

original: We shall be blades in the dark.
string: 我们将会成为黑暗中的刀刃。

original: Stealth? Mephala approves.
string: 潜行？梅法拉赞同。

original: Shall I flank them?
string: 我应该绕到他们的侧后方吗？

original: We stealing something or killing someone?
string: 我们是要偷东西还是杀人？

original: If they start turning towards you, roll back to cover.
string: 如果它们开始转向你，就滚回去躲避。

original: Ambush? A cunning plan.
string: 伏击？一个狡猾的计划。

original: Looks like you've got lots of loot. Let's go sell some.
string: 看来你捡了不少东西。我们去卖点吧。

original: I hope some of that stuff you're weighed down with is valuable.
string: 希望你背着的一些东西很有价值。

original: Hope you don't mind if I pick a few of the choice things to take off your hands.
string: 希望你不介意我挑选一些精品拿走。

original: I think you should share some of that load. I'll take the shiny part.
string: 我觉得你应该分担一些负担。我来拿那亮闪闪的部分。

original: You could probably drop some of that, you know.
string: 你可能可以减掉一些，你知道的。

original: Seems like it's time to get back to town and find a pawnbroker.
string: 看来是时候回镇找典当商了。

original: We're back in a settlement. We should find some place to sell off all our loot.
string: 我们回到了一个定居点。我们应该找个地方卖掉我们的战利品。

original: If you can find a local guild representative they might have a job for us.
string: 如果你能找到当地行会代表，他们可能有工作给我们做。

original: I heard stories from my Aunt Helspet that most towns like this used to have a Fighters Guild or a Mages Guild outpost.
string: 我听我姑母海尔斯佩特讲过，大多数像这样的小镇过去都有一个战士公会或法师公会的前哨基地。

original: Notice how much the towns shrink over time? In the third age they'd be ten times this size.
string: 注意城镇随时间的推移变小了多少？到了第三时代，它们会是现在的十倍大。

original: They probably don't have a Tribunal Temple here, do they? If they do I'd like to pay my respects.
string: 他们可能没有三一庙在这里，对吧？如果有的话，我想向它们致敬。

original: We should swing by an inn. You drink and carouse, I'll pick some pockets while they're distracted.
string: 我们应该顺便去一家客栈。你喝酒作乐，我趁他们分心的时候偷点东西。

original: Let's go drink! But not too much, need to stay sober to stay aware.
string: 我们去喝酒吧！但不要喝太多，需要保持清醒才能保持警惕。

original: Check the bounty board for any kill contracts. I'd rather skip the fetch tasks though.
string: 查看悬赏板上的任何击杀合同。尽管我宁愿跳过那些寻找任务。

original: Mind if we swing by an apothecary to get some healing supplies?
string: 我们路过药剂师那里拿些治疗用品，你介意吗？

original: Mind if we swing by the Temple of the Divines so I can cunningly deface something?
string: 如果我们沿途经过神的神庙，我可以狡猾地破坏点什么吗？

original: There must be a hall of the dead around here somewhere. Probably lots of coin in that place.
string: 附近一定有个亡者之厅。那地方肯定有不少金币。

original: "I need you to find my lost Generic Hat of Iron", some steward, probably.
string: “我需要你找到我丢失的一顶铁质帽子”，某些管家，可能是。

original: We need to leave. Quickly.
string: 我们需要离开。快点。

original: I like that. I'll... come back later tonight for it.
string: 我喜欢这个。我会晚些时候再来拿。

original: There are some nice things here. I'll make sure to come get them later.
string: 这里有一些不错的东西。我会确保稍后来取的。

original: Ruvi would love that. I suppose I'll actually buy something for once.
string: 鲁维一定会喜欢的。我想我终于可以买点东西了。

original: Could you please distract the shopkeep, just for a moment?
string: 你能不能稍微转移一下店主的注意力，就一会儿？

original: I don't like the way the shopkeep looks at me, as if I'm going to steal something. Which I am.
string: 我不喜欢店主看我的眼神，仿佛我要偷东西。其实我确实要偷。

original: Not all Dunmer are shifty thieves. I am of course, but not all.
string: 并非所有的丹莫都是阴险的小偷。我当然是，但不是所有的人。

original: Shit. Shit shit shit. That should not have fallen out of my pockets.
string: 糟了。糟糕糟糕糟糕。不应该从我的口袋里掉出来的。

original: So expensive! No matter, not all things are acquired with coin.
string: 好贵啊！没关系，不是所有东西都能用金币买到的。

original: What ever happened to haggling?
string: 讨价还价的劲头都去哪了？

original: "Oh you're so handsome." "I'll cut you." "Here's 72 gold." "I'm the Queen of Mournhold." That's how we used to do it.
string: "哦，你真帅啊。" "我会砍你的。" "这里有72金币。" "我是悲伤之城的女王。" 这是我们过去的做法。

original: What do you think of this trinket? Know a fence around that'd buy it?
string: 你觉得这件小饰品怎么样？知道哪个围栏会买吗？

original: Time to unload my very heavy pockets.
string: 是时候把我沉重的口袋倒空了。

original: I have lots of things for the trinket pile to drop off.
string: 我有很多小东西要放下。

original: Now we can get good and drunk!
string: 现在我们可以喝得烂醉！

original: Shit! I forgot to come up with a poem for tonight's poetry reading.
string: 该死！我忘了为今晚的诗歌朗诵准备一首诗。

original: Time to curl up with some Matze and a bawdy romance tale. Did you ever read the one about the Temple of Dibella and the Last Dwemer?
string: 是时候蜷缩在一起，读一些马泽和一个色情言情故事了。你读过那个关于狄贝拉神庙和最后的矮人的故事吗？

original: If you see a pile of half eaten yams that means Dela's around somewhere..
string: 如果你看到一堆吃剩的山药，那意味着德拉在附近..

original: It'd be a good idea to stick around for a bit before heading back out.
string: 在返回之前待一段时间是个好主意。

original: Treasure for the treasure pile!
string: 财宝堆积如山！

original: I know what this place needs? More fountains.
string: 我知道这个地方需要什么？更多的喷泉。

original: I bet all my plants died. N'chow.
string: 我打赌我所有的植物都死了。N'chow。

original: I should check the planters for more deathbell and nightshade. I go through them so quickly.
string: 我应该检查种植箱里是否还有更多死亡之钟和夜影。我用得太快了。

original: It's been a good trip. We should stay at home a bit before the next one.
string: 这是一次愉快的旅行。下次再出门前，我们应该在家里多呆一会。

original: Anything can be food if you're hungry enough.
string: 如果你饿得够厉害，任何东西都可以成为食物。

original: Most pelts don't sell for much. It's the garb you can make with them that does.
string: 大多数毛皮并不值钱。真正值钱的是你用它们制作的装束。

original: We here for pelts, reagents, or both?
string: 我们这里是为了皮毛、药剂，还是两者都要？

original: Not much treasure in a place like this.
string: 像这样的地方没什么宝藏。

original: Smells pretty rank in here.
string: 这里闻起来相当刺鼻。

original: Be careful what you step in.
string: 小心你踩到什么。

original: I bet there's lots of treasure down here!
string: 我敢打赌这里有很多宝藏！

original: You kill, I loot. Fine, I'll help kill too.
string: 你杀人，我捡东西。好吧，我也会帮忙杀人。

original: We're going to be rich! Don't miss any treasure chests.
string: 我们将会发财！不要错过任何宝箱。

original: If we have time, we should stop to loot the corpses.
string: 如果有时间，我们应该停下来搜刮尸体。

original: If you drain the blood from a fresh corpse, and use a minor charm to preserve it, you'll have a nice snack to sell to the next vampire you meet.
string: 如果你从一个新鲜尸体里抽取血液，再用一点小魅力来保存它，你就会有一个不错的小吃可以卖给下一个遇到的吸血鬼。

original: There's probably fucking traps all over this place.
string: 这地方应该到处都是该死的陷阱。

original: Watch out for the obvious chests with the tiny fucking rope by them. It'll be a trap.
string: 注意那些明显的箱子旁边带有小细绳的。那会是个陷阱。

original: Let me know and I can set up a flanking position.
string: 告诉我，我可以设立侧翼阵地。

original: Something will probably try and fucking ambush us in here. Bad news for them.
string: 肯定会有东西试图在这里伏击我们。对他们来说这是一个坏消息。

original: So how do you want to do this? Shall I go in first or do you want to take lead?
string: 那么你打算怎么做？我应该先进去还是你想带头？

original: This reminds me of all the places where Ruvi and I would get in the shit.
string: 这让我想起了鲁维和我经历过的所有困境的地方。

original: Years ago I used to do contract work, would get sent into places like this to find the most random idiotic shit.
string: 多年前，我曾做过合同工作，被派去像这样的地方找到最不靠谱的东西。

original: So much snow... a bit frigid out today, is it not?
string: 这么多的雪...今天有点寒冷，不是吗？

original: If my hands get any colder I'll have trouble holding my blades.
string: 如果我的手再冷下去，我就拿不住我的利刃了。

original: Fucking Jyggalag's frozen nutsack. Shall we find somewhere to warm up?
string: 该死的。我们找个地方暖和一下吧？

original: The splash of red against the snow? Beautiful.
string: 红雪光映？美丽。

original: Snow muffles your approach but reveals your steps. It'll give you one chance to strike.
string: 雪软化了你的接近声音，却显露了你的步伐。它会给你一个袭击的机会。

original: Now I understand why so many Nords wear furs.
string: 现在我明白为什么这么多纳德人穿毛皮了。

original: I admit it. The snow's pretty all piled up. There, I said it. Can we move on?
string: 我承认，堆积起来的雪很漂亮。我说了，我们能继续了吗？

original: I don't understand why Selvi likes the snow so much.
string: 我不明白Selvi为什么这么喜欢雪。

original: Sorry if your pack feels a bit light. I'll put it back.
string: 抱歉如果你的背包感觉有点轻。我会把东西放回去。

original: I can't help it, I just like collecting things.
string: 我就是忍不住喜欢收集东西。

original: I've been trying to take up gardening but it takes a lot of fucking patience.
string: 我一直在尝试种花园，但要有很多耐心才行。

original: Shit. You don't expect us to be heading to Blacklight do you? I'm... not well liked there.
string: 哦。你难道指望我们去黑光城吗？在那里我...并不受欢迎。

original: If our path takes us to Mournhold I'll wait outside. Bit of a bounty you see.
string: 如果我们的道路通向哀悼之城，我会在外面等候。有点赏金在身。

original: Vivec once had a city named after them, but unlike the other old Saints was the city what died and Vivec ran off somewhere.
string: 维威克曾经有座以他们命名的城市，但与其他古圣徒不同，这座城市灭亡了，而维威克则消失在某个地方。

original: Our ancestors venerated the Daedra for thousands of years, and now they do so once more.
string: 我们的祖先尊崇了迪德拉数千年，现在他们再次如此做。

original: I revere all three of the Reclamations equally. Azura guides my mind, Boethiah my blade, and Mephala my steps.
string: 我同样尊敬三大复辟神。阿祖拉引导我的思绪，波耶西亚引导我的刀，梅法拉引导我的步伐。

original: Becoming a Sister of the Ashen Veil is a lifelong pursuit.
string: 成为灰纱姐妹是一生的追求。

original: I didn't have much going for me before I joined the Order.
string: 我加入秩序前并没有什么优势。

original: Maybe I don't say this much, but I do like tromping about with you.
string: 或许我不常说这句，但我确实喜欢和你一起漫步。

original: Don't you ever want me to take the lead?
string: 难道你不希望我带头吗？

original: Where are we going, oh brave leader?
string: 我们要去哪，勇敢的领袖？

original: What does n'chow mean? It's something terrible smelling that comes out of the rear end of a kagouti.
string: n'chow是什么意思？它是指从喀古提的后端散发出的一种可怕的气味。

original: What does fetcher mean? A useless servant or slave, good only for "fetching" things. A loser at the great game.
string: “拾物人”是什么意思？一个无用的仆人或奴隶，只擅长“拾起”东西。一个“大游戏”的失败者。

original: The Great Game, emphasis, is the struggle between Dunmer houses. The little great game is our everyday lives as fucking struggle.
string: 《上古卷轴5：天际》中，强调“大博弈”指的是丹莫尔家族之间的斗争。而“小博弈”则是我们日常生活中的搏斗。

original: Our Lady Boethiah is all about struggle. That's kind of her thing.
string: 我们的波耶西亚女士全靠奋斗。那是她的特色。

original: We of the Ashen Veil don't like Orsimer much. Malacath is not a friend to us.
string: 我们灰纱教会不太喜欢兽人。玛拉凯斯对我们来说不是朋友。

original: My Order is basically a foe of all the sad little Divines worshippers that infest so much of Tamriel.
string: 我的教团基本上是所有广泛分布在泰姆瑞尔的可怜神典崇拜者的敌人。

original: I mistrust most Altmer, as a rule. The Altmer and their Ancestor Gods cast out the Chimer and our Daedric patrons.
string: 我一般不信任多数高等精灵。高等精灵及其祖先神把卡莫和我们的追随者赶走了。

original: I suppose the Vigil of Stendarr are our greatest enemies, but so are the followers of Talos, Arkay, Mara... fucking all of them really.
string: 我想斯坦达尔的守卫是我们最大的敌人，但塔洛斯，阿卡伊，玛拉的信徒也是……真是该死的所有人。

original: We don't get along well with the Argonians. Maybe it's the whole slavery and invasion thing?
string: 我们和亚龙人相处得不好。也许是因为奴役和入侵的原因？

original: We should stand over the Nords, not under them. It shames me to see Dunmer as refugees.
string: 我们应该站在诺德人之上，而不是之下。看到丹莫人作为难民让我感到羞愧。

original: The Empire outlawed slavery, but House Dres never stopped practicing it. They called them "bonded house servants".
string: 帝国禁止奴隶制，但德拉斯家族从未停止实施。他们称之为“绑定家仆”。

original: Did you know a blood offering to the Daedra doesn't actually require someone to die, in most cases. A cut and a promise suffice.
string: 你知道向迪德拉献血祭其实大多数情况并不需要有人死亡。一刀就足够了。

original: You have my thanks, for bringing me so many places to wet my blades.
string: 你有我的感谢，带我去了这么多地方磨练武艺。

original: I've heard it said Dunmer have 'hot blood', but isn't everyone's blood hot when spilled? Not the fucking Argonians! Ha!
string: 我听说丹莫人有“热血”，但是流出来的血是不是每个人都是热的？该死的阿贡尼亚人除外！哈！

original: I have always struggled a bit to adjust to Monastery life. Fortunately I don't have to stay there all the time. Plus there's no shitty celibacy rule.
string: 我一直有一些困难适应修道院生活。幸运的是，我不必一直呆在那里。而且没有可恶的独身规定。

original: I bet Ruvi will love this. I'll wrap it up for her. Might get me another night with her.
string: 我打赌鲁维会喜欢这个。我会把它包装好给她。也许能为我争取另一个晚上。

original: I 'found' this for Dela. Do you think she'll like it? I always try and bring little gifts home for her, but its always me she unwraps first.
string: 我“找到”了这个给德拉。你认为她会喜欢吗？我总是尽量给她带回一些小礼物，但总是先被她解包。

original: Hope to see you later.
string: 希望以后能见到你。

original: Until we find each other again. So long.
string: 直到我们再次相遇。再见。

original: Good journeys to you, ser'a.
string: 一路顺风，ser'a。

original: So long, friend.
string: 再见了，朋友。

original: Watch out for Aedra worshippers.
string: 小心阿德拉崇拜者。

original: Goodbye. Hope your travels go well.
string: 再会。祝你旅途愉快。

original: Are you here about the... No? Oh. Good. Hello.
string: 你是来这里问...不是吗？哦。好的。你好。

original: I didn't take it, I swear!
string: 我没拿，我发誓！

original: Hello?
string: 喂？

original: Yes, ser'a?
string: 是的，长官？

original: It's nice to see you. How are you?
string: 见到你真是太好了。你好吗？

original: Nice running into you.
string: 很高兴能遇见你。

original: They're dead so they won't need this.
string: 他们已经去世，所以不会需要这个。

original: Give me a moment. It's pocket rifling time.
string: 给我一点时间。现在该动手搜身了。

original: I hate how folks keep coinpurses at their waist, usually makes them piss-stained when I loot their corpse.
string: 我讨厌人们把钱袋挂在腰间，通常当我搜查他们的尸体时会弄湿。

original: Yep, quite dead.
string: 是的，已经死了。

original: This looks like fun.
string: 看起来很有意思。

original: Hope they don't mind if I cut a few purses during all this.
string: 希望他们不介意我在这期间偷几个钱包。

original: Looks like a fight. Joy.
string: 看起来要打一场。真是快乐。

original: Why is everyone always fighting?
string: 为什么每个人都要打架呢？

original: Closing in!
string: 接近！

original: Engaging!
string: 接战！

original: Flanking!
string: 包抄！

original: I'll cut you!
string: 我会割断你！

original: Weapon's too big!
string: 武器太大了！

original: Get me something lighter!
string: 给我找点轻的！

original: My arms! Too heavy!
string: 我的胳膊！太重了！

original: Can I drop this monstrosity?
string: 我可以把这个庞然大物扔掉吗？

original: Switching to skirmish.
string: 切换到冲突状态。

original: Shooting arrows!
string: 射箭！

original: Can't reach them, swapping to my bow!
string: 达不到他们，换上我的弓！

original: Aiming. Aiming. Shit.
string: 瞄准。瞄准。该死。

original: You can run but I'll catch you!
string: 你可以逃跑，但我会追到你的！

original: That's right, flee.
string: 就是，快逃吧。

original: Fine, run away!
string: 好吧，逃吧！

original: If you run I can't empty your pockets!
string: 如果你跑的话，我可不会心慈手软地不把你搜空！

original: Run away, coward!
string: 逃跑，懦夫！

original: I guess I'd better run after you, fetcher!
string: 我想我最好去追一下你，搬运工！

original: To battle!
string: 出发吧！

original: I'll cut you!
string: 我会割断你！

original: Death!
string: 死亡！

original: Haa!
string: 哈！

original: Arh!
string: 啊

original: N'chow!
string: 恩丘！

original: Fetcher!
string: 奉命者！

original: Haarg!
string: 哈啊！

original: Meph... Boeth... Ahh just die!
string: 墨菲...博艾斯...啊，去死吧！

original: To the death!
string: 直至死亡！

original: We've retaken Bal Meryan. What now?
string: 我们已经重新夺回巴尔莫兰。现在该做些什么？

original: We should probably look into getting some sort of income. I'll think about this some more. You should talk to one of the Hands, Nindasu or Drelyra.
string: 我们可能应该考虑获取某种收入。我会再考虑一下。你应该和其中一位执行官，妮达苏或德莉拉谈一谈。

original: I know this place looks all fancy but we're dirt poor right now. Nindasu likely has some plan for you while I figure out how to make some coin.
string: 我知道这个地方看起来很豪华，但现在我们真的一贫如洗。妮达苏可能已经为你制定了一些计划，而我要想办法挣点钱。

original: I plan on getting drunk, reading a book, and falling asleep. Maybe my sister Drelyra has a better idea.
string: 我打算喝醉，看书，然后入睡。也许我妹妹德莉拉有更好的主意。

original: That's easy. Can't have a keep without a smith. I am trying to learn what I can, but it's hard to do without a teacher.
string: 这很容易。不能没有铁匠的要塞。我正在尽力学习，但没有老师的指导很难。

original: Also, if you havn't checked with Drelyra and Nindasu yet, you should. As the Hands they'll know best.
string: 而且，如果你还没与德莉拉和妮达苏交谈过，你应该去询问。作为“手”，他们最了解。

original: All of us have duties that keep us quite busy. Simply put, we need a cook. Anyone will do really.
string: 我们所有人都有繁忙的职责。简而言之，我们需要一个厨师。任何人都可以。

original: Please speak with Drelyra and Ardela before you leave. They have tasks for you.
string: 在离开之前请与德莉拉和阿尔黛拉交谈。她们有任务给你。

original: It'd be wonderful to get an apothecary in residence. We have plenty of places to plant ingredients.
string: 有一个药剂师住在这里会很棒。我们有很多地方可以种植药材。

original: Also, make sure to check with Nindasu and Ardela. They have some ideas as well.
string: 同时，确保与妮达苏和阿尔黛拉联系。她们也有一些想法。

original: Where should I go to find staff for Bal Meryan?
string: 我应该去哪里找员工为巴尔莫兰服务？

original: Riften or Windhelm I think. Lots of Dunmer there. I'd try Riften first.
string: 我想是裂谷城或风盔城。那里有很多丹莫。我会先去裂谷城试试。

original: She must be Dunmer of course, which limits our options. Riften would be a good place to start. Windhelm after that.
string: 她肯定是丹莫人，这限制了我们的选择。利菲顿将是一个不错的起点。之后是风盔城。
