string: 你与内洛斯大师的时间有成果吗？

original: It was quite productive. He suggested that I leave the monastery and join House Telvanni. I refused but it was an interesting offer.
string: 这很有成效。他建议我离开修道院，加入特尔瓦尼家族。我拒绝了，但这是一个有趣的提议。

original: Be careful with House Telvanni's teachings. They are not known for their caution.
string: 小心对待特尔瓦尼家族的教诲。他们不以谨慎而闻名。

original: The secrets of Nirn are never unlocked through a path of caution!
string: 尘世的秘密不会通过谨慎之路揭示出来！

original: House Telvanni has produced some of the finest wizards in Tamriel.
string: 泰尔瓦尼家族孕育了泰姆瑞尔最出色的巫师之一。

original: Perhaps one day I might be counted in that category as well.
string: 也许有一天我也会被划入那一类人中。

original: Have you gathered anything from these ruins?
string: 你从这些废墟中学到了什么吗？

original: A few gleanings perhaps, but nothing of import. The magic that permeates this place is in a long slow decline.
string: 也许有一些碎片，但没有什么重要的。这个地方弥漫的魔法在长期缓慢衰退。

original: Patience perhaps is needed to discern the enchantments that remain.
string: 或许需要耐心来看出依然存在的魔法

original: Patience? As if i wanted to spend the next month of my life in this wretched ruin.
string: 耐心？就好像我想要在这个可恶的废墟中度过下一个月一样。

original: If it is faded so badly, it is not worth our time.
string: 如果它褪色如此严重，就不值得我们花时间。

original: I agree. Let us go somewhere less decrepit.
string: 我同意。我们去一个不那么破旧的地方吧。

original: So? Did you find anything useful in the library here?
string: 那么？你在这里的图书馆里找到什么有用的东西了吗？

original: I did actually, some tomes about Destruction magic that might come in handy. The Arcanaeum is surprisingly well stocked.
string: 实际上我有一些关于毁灭魔法的书籍可能会派上用场。奥尔卡尼姆的藏书室居然存货丰富。

original: Be careful what forces you harness.
string: 小心你驾驭的力量。

original: I'll make sure there are only two peasants that stand in my blizzard and die, rather than three.
string: 我会确保只有两个农民站在我的暴风雪中死去，而不是三个。

original: Destruction magic is always worth investigating.
string: 毁灭魔法总是值得研究的。

original: That's right, it is!
string: 没错，就是！

original: We've visited everywhere on your list.
string: 我们已经去过你名单上的所有地方。

original: We have. The connections I made and the knowledge I gained along the way will be invaluable. However...
string: 我们有。我所建立的联系和所获得的知识将是无价的。然而……

original: I have uncovered fragments and snippets of knowledge that point to a great secret at the heart of Skyrim, a lost ancient city of the Dwemer.
string: 我已经找到了一些线索和知识片段，指向了天际中心的一个巨大秘密，一座失落的矮人古城。

original: This city is located in the great cavern of Blackreach, lit by an artificial sun of arcane Dwemer make. I'd very much like to see this place.
string: 这个城市位于黑降内，由瓦玛人制造的神秘太阳照亮。我非常想看看这个地方。

original: If we can find a way into Blackreach, I shall take you there.
string: 如果我们能找到通往黑降的方法，我会带你去那里。

original: Who knows what secrets we might pry from such a place? What wonders?
string: 谁知道我们能从那样的地方揭示出什么秘密？会有什么奇迹？

original: That seems ominous. I don't like that rumbling.
string: 那看起来不祥。我不喜欢那种隆隆声。

original: I have simply siphoned some power from this place for myself. There is nothing to... Oh dear.
string: 我只是从这个地方榨取了一些力量，没有什么大不了的...哦天啊。

original: We've visited all the places on your list. What next?
string: 我们已经参观了你列出的所有地方。接下来怎么办？

original: I know of a strange temple in the center of Solstheim with Daedric architecture. I wanted to gather what other power I could first, but it is time.
string: 我知道索瑟海姆中心有一个奇怪的神殿。我本想先敛取其他能量，但现在是时候了。

original: I am certain there is much power to be found there. It is also likely to be quite dangerous. We should head there at once.
string: 我相信那里有很大的力量可寻。但也很危险。我们应该立即前往那里。

original: You must be careful, not all power is safe to claim.
string: 你必须小心，不是所有的力量都能安全获取。

original: Nonsense! We're alive. Thus the power was ours to claim. I'll speak no more of this!
string: 胡说八道！我们还活着。因此力量就掌握在我们手中。我不会再提这件事了！

original: Absolutely! Great power is not given, it must be taken!
string: 当然！强大的力量不是给予的，必须争取！

original: We make a good pair, you and I. There is much we shall achieve together.
string: 我们是天作之合，你我。我们将一起取得许多成就。

original: It is time to go find you an animal to train.
string: 是时候找只动物来训练你了。

original: Really? Let's go at once! I'll grab my things.
string: 真的吗？那我们立刻出发！我去拿我的东西。

original: What are your thoughts on finding an animal to befriend?
string: 你对寻找一个动物来交朋友有什么看法？

original: We'll find one, I'm sure of it! We just have to keep looking.
string: 我们会找到的，我对此很有把握！我们只需要继续寻找。

original: I'm keeping an eye out for tracks. We'll find something appropriate soon.
string: 我在留意着痕迹。我们马上会找到合适的目标。

original: I'm still sad about that poor wolf. Why'd it have to attack us?
string: 我还为那只可怜的狼感到伤心。它为什么要袭击我们呢？

original: I wish that wolf wasn't so crazed. Maybe it was sick?
string: 我希望那只狼不会那么疯狂。也许它生病了？

original: I feel bad we killed that sabre cat. Do you think it had rockjoint?
string: 我觉得我们杀了那只剑齿虎有点过分。你觉得它得了石关节病吗？

original: I hated having to kill that sabre cat, but it was him or us.
string: 我讨厌不得不杀死那只冰狼，但这是他还是我们。

original: Those Vigilants made taming trolls seem so easy, but its not!
string: 那些警戒者训服绿皮巨魔看起来轻而易举，但其实并非如此！

original: What was I thinking, trying to befriend a smelly troll?
string: 我在想什么，竟然试图和一只臭气熏天的巨魔交朋友？

original: Maybe trying to tame a spider wasn't a good idea.
string: 也许尝试驯服蜘蛛不是个好主意。

original: Do you know anyone who befriended a spider? I wanted to be the first one.
string: 你知道有谁和蜘蛛交好吗？我想成为第一个。

original: I read some stories about the Falmer taming chaurus, but our attempt did not go very well at all.
string: 我读过一些关于法尔美人驯服混沌蝎的故事，但我们的尝试并不顺利。

original: I'm about to give up, this isn't going to work.
string: 我快要放弃了，这行不通。

original: I've picked up the tracks of an animal nearby. By the looks of it, a young wolf.
string: 我找到了附近一只动物的踪迹。看起来是一只幼狼。

original: I've picked up the tracks of an animal nearby. By the looks of it, a young wolf.
string: 我找到了附近一只动物的踪迹。看起来是一只幼狼。

original: There are animal tracks nearby, of a small sabre cat. I will attempt to track it.
string: 附近有一些小剑牙猫的动物足迹。我将尝试追踪它。

original: There are animal tracks nearby, of a small sabre cat. I will attempt to track it.
string: 附近有一些小剑牙猫的动物足迹。我将尝试追踪它。

original: I've noticed some tracks. By the lingering smell, a young troll. We can train a troll! The Vigilants did!
string: 我发现了一些踪迹。从残留的气味来看，是一个年轻的巨魔。我们能驯服一个巨魔！警戒者做过！

original: I've noticed some tracks. By the lingering smell, a young troll. We can train a troll! The Vigilants did!
string: 我发现了一些踪迹。从残留的气味来看，是一个年轻的巨魔。我们能驯服一个巨魔！警戒者做过！

original: These are spider tracks by the look of them. We can tame a spider, right?
string: 从这些痕迹看，这是蜘蛛的足迹。我们可以驯服一只蜘蛛，对吧？

original: These are spider tracks by the look of them. We can tame a spider, right?
string: 从这些痕迹看，这是蜘蛛的足迹。我们可以驯服一只蜘蛛，对吧？

original: These look like chaurus tracks, by the size of it a fresh fledgling. What's it doing out here? Don't the Falmer train these things?
string: 这看起来像是切勒斯的踪迹，从大小来看是一只新的幼崽。它在这里做什么？不是法尔默人训练这些东西吗？

original: I've noticed some tracks of a small bear, and some blood. By the looks of it the poor animal is wounded. We need to find it!
string: 我注意到一些小熊的踪迹，还有些血迹。看起来可怜的动物受伤了。我们需要找到它！

original: Here he is, the poor little guy. Right next to his dead mother too! Please talk to me about what we should do.
string: 这就是可怜的小家伙。就在他死去的母亲旁边！请和我讨论一下我们应该怎么做。

original: I've noticed some tracks of a small bear, and some blood. By the looks of it the poor animal is wounded. We need to find it!
string: 我注意到一些小熊的踪迹，还有些血迹。看起来可怜的动物受伤了。我们需要找到它！

original: Here he is, the poor little guy. Right next to his dead mother too! Please talk to me about what we should do.
string: 这就是可怜的小家伙。就在他死去的母亲旁边！请和我讨论一下我们应该怎么做。

original: Do you think this little bear will be all right?
string: 你认为这只小熊会没事吗？

original: He needs a lot of care but he should live. A poultice, some good food, and time, and he'll be in much better shape.
string: 他需要很多照料，但他应该会活下来。一些药膏，一些好东西，再加点时间，他就会好多了。

original: It's a shame what happene to his mother, but it is far too late to save her.
string: 对他母亲的遭遇感到遗憾，但现在已经为时太晚无法救她。

original: We should take this little one back to Bal Meryan as soon as possible.
string: 我们应该尽快把这个小家伙带回巴尔莫兰。

original: Definitely. Please help me with his paw. I don't think he can walk far, but we can make a sling for him and nurse him to health during the journey.
string: 没错。请帮我他的爪子。我觉得它走不了远，但我们可以给他做个吊床，在旅途中照料他至康复。

original: There he is. What should we do?
string: 他在那里。我们应该怎么办？

original: We'll need to find something to splint and wrap his paw with.
string: 我们需要找些东西来夹和用绷带包扎他的爪子。

original: There he is. What should we do?
string: 他在那里。我们应该怎么办？

original: We'll need to find something to splint and wrap his paw with.
string: 我们需要找些东西来夹和用绷带包扎他的爪子。

original: You seem just the kind of Dunmer I was looking for.
string: 你看起来正是我在找的那种黑暗精灵。

original: I do? What do you mean by that?
string: 我呢？你是什么意思？

original: The Ashen Veil has reclaimed Bal Meryan and is looking for new members.
string: 灰纱修会已经夺回了巴尔莫兰，并正在寻找新成员。

original: And why should I join them?
string: 我为什么要加入他们呢？

original: Firstly, you'll have free room and board. Secondly...
string: 首先，您将得到免费的食宿。其次…

original: I had better be able to leave or return whenever I choose if the pay is 'food and lodging'.
string: 如果待遇是‘食宿’，我最好可以随时离开或返回。

original: You may freely come and go, though you'll have some daily tasks to do.
string: 你可以自由进出，但是你会有一些每日任务要做。

original: What kind of tasks? I'm interested.
string: 是什么样的任务？我很感兴趣。

original: We're looking for a daytime guard to watch the gate.
string: 我们正在寻找一名白天看门的卫兵。

original: I'll take the position and start making my way to Bal Meryan.
string: 我会接受这个职位，并开始前往巴尔莫兰。

original: We're looking for a daytime guard to watch the battlements.
string: 我们正在寻找一个日间守卫来看守城墙。

original: I'll take the position and start making my way to Bal Meryan.
string: 我会接受这个职位，并开始前往巴尔莫兰。

original: We're looking for a nighttime guard to watch the gate.
string: 我们正在寻找一个夜间看守大门的警卫。

original: I'll take the position and start making my way to Bal Meryan.
string: 我会接受这个职位，并开始前往巴尔莫兰。

original: We're looking for a nighttime guard to watch the battlements.
string: 我们正在寻找夜间看守壁垒的警卫。

original: I'll take the position and start making my way to Bal Meryan.
string: 我会接受这个职位，并开始前往巴尔莫兰。

original: We're looking for some help in the Temple in the evening.
string: 我们晚上在神庙里需要一些帮助。

original: I'll take the position and start making my way to Bal Meryan.
string: 我会接受这个职位，并开始前往巴尔莫兰。

original: We're looking for some help in the Temple in the morning.
string: 早上我们在寺庙里需要一些帮手。

original: I'll take the position and start making my way to Bal Meryan.
string: 我会接受这个职位，并开始前往巴尔莫兰。

original: We're looking for some help with the gardens in the morning.
string: 我们想在早上得到一些园艺方面的帮助。

original: I'll take the position and start making my way to Bal Meryan.
string: 我会接受这个职位，并开始前往巴尔莫兰。

original: We're looking for some help with the gardens in the afternoon.
string: 我们下午需要一些园艺帮助。

original: I'll take the position and start making my way to Bal Meryan.
string: 我会接受这个职位，并开始前往巴尔莫兰。

original: We shall no longer be needing your services.
string: 我们将不再需要你的服务。

original: That's a shame. Are you sure? I've enjoyed my time here at Bal Meryan.
string: 很遗憾。你确定吗？我在巴尔莫兰度过的时光还挺不错的。

original: Yes I am certain. It is time for you to leave.
string: 是的，我确定。是时候让你离开了。

original: If that is what you have decided. Should you ever need me again, just ask.
string: 如果这是你决定的。如果你再需要我，只需提出要求。

original: If you like it so much, then you should stay.
string: 如果你这么喜欢，那就留下吧。

original: You had me worried. Thank you.
string: 让我很担心呢。谢谢你。

original: I'm ready to go start building our information network.
string: 我准备开始建立我们的情报网络。

original: Took you long enough. What are you waiting for, an invitation?
string: 你花了好久。你在等什么，一封邀请函吗？

original: I hereby invite your royal pompousness to bring me on whatever horker shit tasks distract you, so long as we meet a few folks on the way!
string: 我在此邀请您那令人敬畏的皇家高贵，带领我去执行无论多么无聊的任务，只要途中能遇到一些人们！

original: Do you have any leads? Where should we go first?
string: 你有线索吗？我们应该先去哪里？

original: I do know a few people in Riften. There's one in particular who would be very helpful, a woman named Kendara. I've ... worked with her before.
string: 我在裂谷城认识几个人。有一个特别会帮忙的，一个名叫肯达拉的女人。我...和她以前有过合作。

original: I've already sent word ahead. She should be waiting for us outside Riften at the south gate, the boarded up one.
string: 我已经提前通知过。她应该在裂谷城南门外等着我们，那个被封住的门。

original: What was that all about?
string: 那到底是怎么回事？

original: I ... might not have been completely honest about the nature of my relationship with Kendara. We were lovers.
string: 我...也许没有完全真诚地谈论我与肯达拉之间关系的本质。我们是情人。

original: We did a lot of ... things together. Then I stole from her. Then I left her. It seems she has carried a grudge.
string: 我们曾经做了很多……事情。然后我从她那里偷了东西。然后我离开了她。看起来她一直心怀怨恨。

original: I didn't think you'd be dumb enough to actually show. But Vendressa has always been a bit of a cracked brick, so it really shouldn't surprise me.
string: 我没想到你会蠢到真的出现。但温德丽莎一直有点疯狂，所以我也不惊讶。

original: Sorry to lump you in with this sad excuse for a thief, but now you get to die alongside her. I hope it was worth it.
string: 抱歉，将你和这个可悲的小偷归为一类，但现在你将与她一起死去。希望这一切是值得的。

original: That was some grudge! She attacked us! What did you steal?
string: 那是一场怨恨！她攻击了我们！你偷了什么？

original: At first, just skooma and gold to pay for skooma. Things were getting a bit desperate and one night...
string: 起初，只是为了购买斯库玛而用斯库玛和金币。情况变得有些绝望，某个晚上……

original: I may or may not have stolen all her clothes, armor, and weapons as she slept, pawned them, and ran off that night.
string: 也许我在她睡觉时偷了她的衣服、盔甲和武器，典当了这些东西，然后在那天晚上溜走了。

original: Vendressa!
string: 温德丽莎！

original: I know. I know. Terrible of me. But it's been a while and I thought she'd be over it like I am.
string: 我知道。我知道。我做得很糟糕。但是已经过了一段时间，我以为她会和我一样忘记这件事。

original: Good news though, the next person on my list. Actually, the ONLY other person on my list - I've never stolen from - or fucked.
string: 好消息是，我的名单上的下一个人。 实际上，名单上唯一的其他人 - 我从未偷过东西或与之混乱。

original: Andelvu Sarethi is her name. She's currently hiding out at her sisters' farm in the Rift.
string: 安德尔乌·萨雷提是她的名字。她目前躲藏在裂谷城的姐妹农场里。

original: Andelvu Sarethi?
string: 安德尔乌·萨雷提？

original: Who's asking? You don't have the look of the authorities to you.
string: 谁在问话呢？你看起来不像是当局。

original: Is that Vendressa behind you? By the Divines, I never thought I'd see her again, not after that job in Ivarstead went so wrong!
string: 你身后是温德丽莎吗？天神保佑，我从未想过我能再次见到她，特别是在那次伊瓦斯泰德的任务失败后！

original: Vendressa and I are looking to set up an information network across Skyrim.
string: 温德丽莎和我正试图在整个天际建立一个信息网络。

original: After what happened at Bal Meryan, that makes sense. I'd be glad to pass along anything I hear to you.
string: 在巴尔莫兰发生的事情之后，这是合理的。我很乐意把我听到的任何消息传达给你。

original: May I ask a small favor? I have a delivery to make, but the bounty I have means I can't go there to do so.
string: 能否请你帮个小忙？我有一个交付任务，但我手上有赏金，不能亲自去那里。

original: Normally I need details first, but I can see Vendressa really wants to do this.
string: 通常我需要先了解细节，但我可以看得出温德丽莎真的想做这件事。

original: I knew you'd come through for me. The delivery is a single crate, to be delivered to Yelden at Honningbrew Meadery near Whiterun.
string: 我知道你会帮我的。这批货物是一个木箱，要送到维特伦的梦蜜酒庄，靠近白漫。

original: I'd go myself, but I have a bounty in that hold. I really appreciate you helping me out like this, and I won't forget it.
string: 我本可以自己去，但我在那个镇有赏金。非常感谢你这样帮我，我不会忘记的。

original: Yelden? I have something for you.
string: 耶尔登？我有东西给你。

original: That's my name. Please pardon the rudeness friend, but... who the fuck are you?
string: 这就是我的名字。请原谅我这样粗鲁地问，但……你到底是谁啊？

original: This is Vendressa. She's a friend of Andelvu Sarethi. We have a crate for you.
string: 这是温德丽莎。她是安德尔乌·萨雷提的朋友。我们有一个板条箱给你。

original: Andelvu couldn't drop it off herself? I suppose it doesn't matter. It's a bit late, but not concerningly so, and everything is inside.
string: 安德尔乌难道自己无法送来吗？我想也没关系。虽然有点晚了，但不值得担忧，东西都在里面。

original: I accept this delivery, though it seems I'll be needing new couriers. Say, you wouldn't be interested in some work, would you?
string: 我收下了这批货物，尽管我似乎需要新的信使。话说，你对做点工作感兴趣吗？

original: What kind of... Oh I see Vendressa is already saying 'yes'.
string: 什么样的…哦我明白了，温德丽莎已经答应了。

original: I'd like you to find out what happened to one of my couriers, a Khajiit. He's quite late with a delivery.
string: 我希望你查出我的信使之一，一名Khajiit，发生了什么事。他交付物品已经相当晚了。

original: You'll find him somewhere along the road between the Whiterun tundra and Rorikstead. Hopefully not dead.
string: 你会在白漫的苔原和洛利克镇之间的路上找到他。希望他没有死。

original: We're actually looking to set up an information network...
string: 我们实际上是想建立一个信息网络……

original: I deal in information as well. We can discuss this once you find my missing Khajiit.
string: 我也做信息交易。一旦你找到我的失踪凯吉特，我们可以讨论一下。

original: We found your Khajiit. He's dead.
string: 我们找到了你的凯吉特。他死了。

original: That's a shame. I wish I remembered his name so I could drink to his death. Did you get the package?
string: 真遗憾。我希望我记得他的名字，这样我就可以为他的死干杯了。你拿到包裹了吗？

original: I did. Here you go. About that information...
string: 我知道了。给你。关于那些信息...

original: I'll start making some inquiries. In the meantime, could you pick up a few things for me?
string: 我要开始打听一些事情。同时，你能为我买一些东西吗？

original: I think... Oh. Vendressa has already said yes. Then... yes.
string: 我想...哦。温德丽莎已经表示同意。那么...好吧。

original: Wonderful. It's nice to have reliable employees for once. I need you to visit two camps to meet with some independent boat operators I work with.
string: 太棒了，有可靠的员工真是件好事。我需要你去拜访两个营地，跟一些独立的船舶经营者会面，他们是我合作伙伴。

original: The first is a small camp just across the river from the Solitude Docks, under a small overhang near the arch.
string: 第一个是一个小营地，就在离独孤码头对岸的小河边，靠近拱门下的一个小悬崖。

original: The second is a little bandit camp west of Dawnstar, set back a little from the shoreline. The folks at each camp should have a delivery for you.
string: 第二个是晨星以西一处小贼营地，稍微靠向海岸线。每个营地的人应该有你的交付物。

original: We're here for Yelden's delivery.
string: 我们是来替耶尔登的交付的。

original: You're late. But not too late. It's already been paid for, which is the only reason we stuck around.
string: 你迟到了。但也不算太晚。已经付账了，这是我们留下的唯一原因。

original: Here's the crate, it should all be in there. Be careful in the swamps, there are lots of chaurus at night.
string: 这是箱子，里面应该都在那里。在沼泽中小心，晚上有很多查鲁斯。

original: Talk to Jaaren.
string: 找杰伦谈一谈。

original: Here are the deliveries from the two groups of smugglers. Golfar is dead.
string: 这是两组走私贩的交付物。Golfar已经死了。

original: Who? It doesn't matter as long as we have the goods, which we do. Good work. I'll pass along any useful information I hear.
string: 谁？没关系，只要我们有货物，就行了，我们有。干得好。我会转达我听到的任何有用信息。

original: I think it's time for you to meet 'The Boss'. Her name's Ysolda, and she is not one to be trifled with. She'll be expecting you in Whiterun.
string: 我觉得是时候让你见见“老板”了。她叫伊索尔达，不是好惹的。她会在白漫等你。

original: Yelden sent me to speak with you.
string: 耶尔登派我和你谈话。

original: Yelden, he's such a hard worker. I assume this is about the deliveries? I'm glad to hear everything is in order.
string: 耶尔登，他是个非常勤奋的人。我猜这跟运送有关？很高兴听到一切都井井有条。

original: As you've been so very helpful, I have another task for you, a little assistance in exchange for me helping you.
string: 由于你之前非常帮忙，我有另一个任务要求你，帮助换取我帮助你的小小帮助。

original: What's the ... Oh I see Vendressa is once again eagerly saying "Yes".
string: 你是...哦，我明白了。温德丽莎又异常渴望地说“是”了。

original: One of my... Oh. Who is that behind you? She... ah. Pardon me, I seem a bit flustered.
string: 我的一个...哦。你背后那位是谁？她...啊。请原谅，我有些慌张。

original: One of my 'cooks' seems to be having difficulty with her 'recipes'. Her name is Muiri and she currently resides in Markarth. Could you check on her?
string: 我的其中一位“厨师”似乎在她的“配方”方面遇到了困难。她叫穆丽，目前居住在马卡斯。你可以去看看她吗？

original: We'll check up on Muiri for you. About our information...
string: 我们会为你查一查穆丽。关于我们的这些情报……

original: Rumors, news, small secrets and the like are things I trade in. I have my finger on the pulse of Skyrim.
string: 传闻、新闻、小秘密之类的我都懂。我对天际的形势了如指掌。

original: And that's not all I'd like to get my finger on... Please introduce me to your gorgeous companion.
string: 而且我并不只关注这个……请向我介绍你那个迷人的伴侣。

original: Actually, step aside. I'll introduce myself. Hello lovely, I'm Ysolda. I think it is time for us to get to know each other ... much more closely.
string: 其实，请让我自我介绍。你好，可爱的，我是伊索尔达。我觉得我们应该更加亲近地了解彼此了……

original: Ysolda sent us to check up on you.
string: 伊索尔达派我们来看看你。

original: Look, I know my cooking has been slow lately. I'm doing my best!
string: 瞧，我知道最近我的烹饪速度有点慢。我正在尽力！

original: I'm having issues with some things I need for the recipe. I have all the other ingredients, but I'm having a hard time finding enough moon sugar.
string: 我在一些需要用到的东西上遇到了问题。我已经准备好了所有其他的材料，但是我很难找到足够的月糖。

original: Relax. We're not going to hurt you. We can get you the moon sugar.
string: 放松一下。我们不会伤害你。我们可以给你摘月糖。

original: Oh, thank you. That's such a relief. You might want to try the Khajiit caravans. I'll need ten moon sugar to restart production.
string: 噢，谢谢你。太好了。你可以尝试露天集市的车队。我需要十份月糖来重启生产。

original: We have your moon sugar.
string: 我们有你们的月糖。

original: You do? Wonderful. I can get started cooking right away. Ysolda will be so happy to hear that everything is running smoothly.
string: 有吗？太棒了。我可以立刻开始烹饪。伊索尔达听到一切都顺利进行会很高兴的。

original: I'll go tell her right away.
string: 我会马上去告诉她。

original: Oh don't worry about that. I can send a letter, talk about my 'cooking'. She'll know what I mean.
string: 哦别担心。我可以寄封信，谈谈我的“烹饪”。她会知道我什么意思。

original: I seem to have misplaced the documents I need.
string: 我好像把需要的文件弄丢了。

original: I seem to have misplaced the banner I needed
string: 我好像把我需要的旗帜搞丢了

original: I seem to have misplaced the documents I need.
string: 我好像把需要的文件弄丢了。

original: I seem to have misplaced the banner I needed
string: 我好像把我需要的旗帜搞丢了

original: I think Ysolda is the perfect person to help us run an information network.
string: 我觉得伊索尔达是我们组建情报网络的最佳人选。

original: I can't believe we're working with someone as pretty as Ysolda!
string: 难以相信我们要和伊索尔达这样漂亮的人一起工作！

original: If I ever leave the monastery I know what I'll do with myself.
string: 如果我有一天离开修道院，我知道我会做什么。

original: Are you as happy as I am to be doing this kind of work?
string: 你和我一样开心在做这样的工作吗？

original: These are exactly the kinds of jobs that lead us to the right kind of people.
string: 这些工作确实是引导我们结识正确人的工作。

original: I'm glad Andelvu came through for us. I admit I was a little worried.
string: 我很高兴安德尔乌为我们效力。我承认我有点担心。

original: Andelvu will be hiding out at her sisters' farm in the Rift.
string: 安德尔乌将躲在裂谷姐妹的农场等你。

original: I did a few jobs with Andelvu back in the day.
string: 从前我和安德尔乌一起干过几份活。

original: I can't believe Kendara attacked us!
string: 我无法相信肯达拉攻击了我们！

original: I'm sure Kendara will come through for us. She has always been a good 'friend' to me.
string: 我相信肯达拉会为我们带来好运。她一直是我的“好朋友”。

original: Kendara and I used to get up to quite a lot of mischief when I was in Riften.
string: 我在裂谷城时，肯德拉和我经常闹着玩些恶作剧。

original: I can't wait to see Kendara again. I miss her.
string: 我迫不及待想再次见到肯达拉。我想念她。

original: It'll be great to build an information network, starting with Kendara.
string: 建立一个信息网络将会很棒，从肯达拉开始。

original: I guess I really upset Kendara
string: 我猜我真的激怒了肯达拉

original: It feels good to be out here making connections.
string: 在这里结交朋友感觉真好。

original: Andelvu spends time with all sorts of bandits and brigands. She'll hear rumors townsfolk never do.
string: 安德尔乌会花时间与各种强盗和土匪在一起。她会听到镇民永远听不到的谣言。

original: It's a shame Andelvu has those bounties. She'd have made a good traveling companion.
string: 安德尔乌有那些悬赏真是太遗憾了。她本可以成为一个很好的旅行伴侣。

original: Isn't this great? Traveling Skyrim, smuggling skooma, and living the good life!
string: 这不是很棒吗？在天际旅行，走私斯库玛，过上美好的生活！

original: I'm quite certain we won't end up dead like those other couriers!
string: 我相当肯定我们不会像那些快递员一样死去！

original: We really got lucky meeting Yelden.
string: 我们真是幸运能遇见耶尔登。

original: Yelden seems like he knows all sorts of useful bits of information.
string: 耶尔登似乎知晓各种有用的信息。

original: I'm very happy to be working with Yelden. This is exactly what I'd hoped for when we set out.
string: 我很高兴能和耶尔登一起工作。这正是我们出发时所期望的。

original: We should go visit Ysolda. I'd like to see her again.
string: 我们应该去探访伊索尔达。我想再见见她。

original: She's such a beauty isn't she, Ysolda? The things I want to do to her...
string: 她是个美人，不是吗，伊索尔达？我想对她做些什么……

original: I'm ready to travel with you across Skyrim.
string: 我已准备好与你一同游历天际。

original: I'll grab my things and we can head out promptly.
string: 我会拿起我的东西，我们可以立刻出发。

original: Where should we head first?
string: 我们先去哪里？

original: We should go to Windhelm before visiting the other cities and holds. There are many Dunmer in Windhelm, in dire need of ministry.
string: 在访问其他城市和要塞之前，我们应该先去风盔城。风盔城有很多遭受困境的丹莫。

original: Nindasu and I would like to know how you are faring.
string: 妮达苏和我很想知道你过得怎么样。

original: I hear Raven Rock has a real problem with Reavers lately. Normally they keep to the wilds but for some reason they're starting to get bolder.
string: 我听说乌鸦岩最近有很大的劫掠者问题。通常他们会在野外活动，但出于某种原因，他们开始变得更加大胆。

original: I might try moving down to Riften. I hear the weather there is much more pleasant.
string: 我可能会考虑搬到裂谷城去。我听说那里的天气更宜人。

original: Azura guided us away from Red Mountain, but this place is hardly any better for the Dunmer.
string: 阿祖拉引导我们远离红山，但这个地方对丹莫来说也几乎没有更好。

original: You'll find a lot of former House Hlaalu hereabouts. With no Great House to protect us, we were left to fend for ourselves.
string: 你会在周围找到许多前哈拉鲁家族的人。没有大家族来保护我们，我们只能靠自己了。

original: Ulfric never investigated the murder of my Uncle Jervu. Someone shoud look into that.
string: 乌弗瑞克从未调查过我叔叔杰尔维的谋杀案。应该有人调查一下。

original: This may not be the worst city in Skyrim, but it's close to it for our kind.
string: 这座城市可能不是天际最糟糕的，但对于我们这些人来说几乎就是了。

original: It's a shame we're not allowed to build a real Temple here.
string: 可惜我们不能在这里建立一个真正的神殿。

original: Are you some kind of priest? ... Oh, she is?
string: 你是某种牧师吗？...哦，她是吗？

original: I'm thinking about going back to Blacklight. I heard the famine is over.
string: 我在考虑回黑光城。我听说饥荒已经结束了。

original: I'd be a lot happier if I could find some better work.
string: 如果能找到更好的工作，我会更开心的。

original: It's as freezing as Coldharbor here but at least there's no ash in the sky.
string: 这里和冷港一样寒冷，但至少天空中没有灰烬。

original: How do you think I'm faring? It's Windhelm, the City of Racist Nords.
string: 你觉得我遇到了什么？那可是风盔城，是诺德种族主义的城市。

original: I hear you have a Reaver problem?
string: 我听说你们有一个海盗的问题？

original: That we do. They havn't attacked the town yet but it's only a matter of time.
string: 我们是这样做。他们还没有攻击城镇，但这只是时间问题。

original: They normally don't bother us and we don't bother them but something, or someone, has gotten them stirred up.
string: 他们通常不打扰我们，我们也不打扰他们，但有什么东西或某人激怒了他们。

original: They've never attacked the town before these last few weeks, but now they lurk about looking for opportunities.
string: 在过去几周，他们从未袭击过这个镇，但现在他们在四处游荡，寻找机会。

original: Reavers. Dwarven machines. Strange waking dreams. Ash spawn. Just another Morndas in Raven Rock.
string: 强盗。矮人机器。奇怪的清醒梦境。灰烬魔。乌鸦岩的另一个梦达斯。

original: A few guards went up to the heights above the mine to deal with the reavers and went missing, which has me worried.
string: 一些卫兵去矿山上面处理劫掠者，然后失踪了，这让我很担心。

original: I can't go up to the heights above the mine and collect ingredients any more because it's crawling with reavers.
string: 我无法像以前那样上山采集矿石上面的植物成分了，因为那里挤满了劫匪。

original: What brings you to my camp? Speak now, or die.
string: 是什么带你来到我的营地？现在说出来，否则就死。

original: We have come to investigate the...
string: 我们前来调查……

original: Silence, cur! Is that... Nindasu? It is!
string: 安静，家伙！那是…妮达苏吗？是他！

original: Tirvandi... lives. She is the former Hand of Boethiah from my order. I assumed she was dead after we lost Bal Meryan.
string: 提尔万迪...还活着。她是我的同教团中前波耶西亚之手。我们失去巴尔莫兰后，我以为她已经死了。

original: Not only is she alive, she's causing a lot of trouble.
string: 她不仅还活着，而且带来了很多麻烦。

original: I know Tirvandi. She wouldn't be doing this without a good reason. We should speak to her and figure out what the issue is.
string: 我了解蒂尔万迪。她不会无缘无故这样做的。我们应该和她谈谈，弄清楚问题所在。

original: She is a threat to the town of Raven Rock, and we must kill her.
string: 她对乌鸦岩镇构成威胁，我们必须杀死她。

original: No! Please, I implore you, hear her out.
string: 不要！拜托，我恳请你，听她说完。

original: Fine. We'll talk, but no promises beyond that.
string: 好的。我们可以谈，但不保证更多。

original: I am sure she has a very good reason for what she is doing.
string: 我相信她做这些事情一定有很好的理由。

original: No. She dies.
string: 不。她死定了。

original: Incorrect!
string: 错误！

original: Very well. I shall hear her out.
string: 好吧。我会倾听她的。

original: I'm ... glad you heard reason.
string: 我...很高兴你听进去了。

original: I am willing to hear you out. Why are you attacking Raven Rock?
string: 我愿意听你的。为什么要攻击乌鸦岩？

original: It is no secret that the Ash Wastes are cruel and unforgiving, but these people are survivors. True Ashlanders.
string: 灰原是残酷且无情的这并不是什么秘密，但这些人是幸存者。真正的灰原之人。

original: But of late, something has changed - a new threat that stalks and kills with fire and fury. We call them the 'Ash Spawn'.
string: 但最近，出现了一种新的威胁——一种用火焰和愤怒潜行并致命的威胁。我们称之为“灰烬魔”。

original: If the Ashlanders are to survive, we must claim a place of refuge. Raven Rock.
string: 如果灰原之民要生存下去，我们必须找到一个避难所。乌鸦岩。

original: What if I dealt with the ash spawn instead, cut them off at their source?
string: 如果我处理灰烬魔，割断它们的源头呢？

original: They are fearsome foes, do you think you could succeed?
string: 他们是可怕的敌人，你认为你能成功吗？

original: I know where the Ash Spawn are coming from - Fort Frostmoth.
string: 我知道灰烬魔是从哪里来的——霜蛾要塞。

original: Do you think you are strong enough to confront them?
string: 你认为你足够强大去面对他们吗？

original: I've already dealt with the Ash Spawn at Fort Frostmoth, and General Carius.
string: 我已经处理了霜蛾要塞的灰烬魔，还有卡里乌斯将军。

original: Boethiah blesses us with your prowess, a mighty feat indeed!
string: 波耶西亚赐予我们你的能力，这是一项巨大的成就！

original: I am up to this challenge.
string: 我准备好迎接这个挑战了。

original: Our Dark Mistress Boethiah shall make that determination. Go, fight with fury until your victory, or your death.
string: 我们的黑暗女主人波耶西亚将做出决定。前去战斗，直到取得胜利或者死亡。

original: Perhaps Fort Frostmoth can be your refuge, as it currently has no master.
string: 也许霜蛾要塞可以成为你的避难所，因为它目前没有主人。

original: It could indeed work. I'll take a group to claim the ruins.
string: 这的确可能行得通。我会带一组人去占领遗迹。

original: With the Ash Spawn menace reduced, there is no need for us to encroach upon Raven Rock. The fools there don't even know what fury they've avoided.
string: 随着灰烬魔的威胁减轻，我们就不需要侵犯鸦羽石了。那里的傻瓜们甚至不知道他们躲过了怒火。

original: You and Nindasu will be welcome to visit Fort Frostmoth, once I have made it secure. Now I must leave, for there is much to be done.
string: 你和妮达苏欢迎到霜蛾要塞，等我把它安全地保护起来。现在我必须离开，还有很多事要做。

original: I have defeated the Ash Spawn at Fort Frostmoth, and slain General Carius.
string: 我已经击败了霜蛾要塞的灰烬魔，并杀死了卡里乌斯将军。

original: Boethiah blesses us with your prowess, a mighty feat indeed!
string: 波耶西亚赐予我们你的能力，这是一项巨大的成就！

original: Perhaps Fort Frostmoth can be your refuge, as it currently has no master.
string: 也许霜蛾要塞可以成为你的避难所，因为它目前没有主人。

original: It could indeed work. I'll take a group to claim the ruins.
string: 这的确可能行得通。我会带一组人去占领遗迹。

original: With the Ash Spawn menace reduced, there is no need for us to encroach upon Raven Rock. The fools there don't even know what fury they've avoided.
string: 随着灰烬魔的威胁减轻，我们就不需要侵犯鸦羽石了。那里的傻瓜们甚至不知道他们躲过了怒火。

original: You and Nindasu will be welcome to visit Fort Frostmoth, once I have made it secure. Now I must leave, for there is much to be done.
string: 你和妮达苏欢迎到霜蛾要塞，等我把它安全地保护起来。现在我必须离开，还有很多事要做。

original: Tirvandi, you're alive! I thought you died in the chaos at Bal Meryan.
string: 蒂尔万迪，你还活着！我以为你在巴尔莫兰的混乱中死去了。

original: I fought past the fanatics with three of our sisters, who fell one by one until only I was left.
string: 我和我们的三个姐妹一起冲击了狂热者，她们一个接一个地倒下，直到只剩下我。

original: I carved a bloody path into Morrowind, half dead from my wounds, burning and bleeding. I waited, clinging to life, for weeks waiting for survivors.
string: 我走出伤痕累累的道路，差点半死不活，燃烧和出血。我等着，抓住生命，等待幸存者。

original: But there were none. There was just me.
string: 但没有人。只有我。

original: Selvoneth and I escaped into Skyrim then made our way to Raven Rock. For some time I thought it was but the two of us who survived.
string: 赛尔沃内斯和我逃进了天际，然后前往乌鸦岩。有段时间我以为只有我们俩幸存了下来。

original: With the help of our friend here, we found others who escaped through the mountains - Drelyra, Ruveni, Vendressa, and Ardela.
string: 在我们这位朋友的帮助下，我们找到了逃脱穿过山脉的其他人 - 德莉拉、鲁文妮、温德丽莎和阿尔黛拉。

original: Would that I could have had such fortune. My wounds grew infected and I collapsed into delirium.
string: 我多么希望自己也有这样的幸运。我的伤口感染了，我陷入了神志不清之中。

original: A group of Ashlanders found me, nursed me back to health. They were headed out of mainland Morrowind to Solstheim, so I went with them.
string: 一群灰原之民找到了我，护理我恢复健康。他们正前往晨风大陆以外的索瑟海姆，我便跟着他们一起走了。

original: When our boat landed on the shore of Solstheim, we were immediately beset by horrid creatures of ash and fire. The Ashlanders stood no chance...
string: 当我们的船靠岸到了索瑟海姆的岸边，我们立刻受到了灰烬和火焰可怕生物的袭击。灰原之民没有任何机会...

original: But I, in the throes of Boethiah's madness, fought through even this adversity, cleaving a bloody path through the creatures.
string: 但我在波耶西亚疯狂的折磨中，即使面对这种逆境，也开创出一条血腥的道路穿过这些生物。

original: How did you end up with these Reavers?
string: 你是怎么和这些掠夺者结伙的？

original: You call them 'Reavers' but they are really just the local Ashlander tribe, the children of the Urshilaku who survived Red Mountain, as am I.
string: 你称他们为“劫掠者”，但他们其实只是当地的灰烬之民部落，生存下来的受到红山影响的孩子，如同我一样。

original: I found this group beset by Ash Spawn, their Wise Woman dead, their Ashkhan ignoring them, drunk off his throne and loafing in the ruin below.
string: 我发现这个团体被灰烬魔困扰，他们的智者已经死了，他们的部落长无视他们，酗酒坐在座位上，懒散地躺在下面的废墟中。

original: After I dispatched the Ash Spawn that assaulted them, Boethiah's booming presence filled my mind. I knew then: these are my people, and I their guide
string: 在我击败袭击他们的灰烬魔后，波耶西亚庞大的存在充满了我的脑海。我知道那时：这些是我的同类，我是他们的引导者。

original: That's all I wanted to know for now.
string: 那些我现在想知道的就是这些。

original: A Shattered Order
string: 破碎的教团

original: I encountered a Dunmer woman who seems to be in some trouble. Perhaps she needs some assistance?
string: 我遇到了一位似乎有些麻烦的丹莫女性。也许她需要一些帮助？

original: The Dunmer woman is a nun from the Order of the Ashen Veil, a small sect of the Tribunal Temple. Her order has been assaulted by an extremist faction of the Vigilants of Stendarr who object to veneration of Azura, Boethiah, and Mephala. I must decide whether to help them or check to see if there is a bounty.
string: 那位丹莫妇女是灰纱修会的修女，是三一庙小教派。她的团体受到斯坦达尔骑士团的极端派别的袭击，他们反对向阿祖拉、波耶西亚和麦芙拉致敬。我必须决定是帮助他们还是查看是否有悬赏。

original: The Dunmer woman is a nun from the Order of the Ashen Veil, a small sect of the Tribunal Temple. Her order has been assaulted by an extremist faction of the Vigilants of Stendarr who object to veneration of Azura, Boethiah, and Mephala. The bounty on them is considerable, and I have decided to claim it.
string: 这名黑暗精灵女子是灰纱修会的一位修女，属于三神庙的一个小派系。她的教团遭到了圣战者极端分子的袭击，他们反对崇拜阿祖拉、波耶西亚和梅法拉。对他们的悬赏颇丰，我决定要去领取。

original: I have slain the six surviving nuns of the Order of the Ashen Veil. I should report my success back to Curate-Militant Bjorkild and claim my reward. I'm not sure exactly where the path to Bal Meryan is, but it is rumored to be in the Velothi Mountains, north of Kagrenzel.
string: 我已经杀死了遗留下来的灰纱修会修女。我应该向军事监督比约基尔报告我的成功，并领取奖励。准确的巴尔莫兰之路我不确定在哪里，但据说在卡格雷泽尔北部的维洛斯山脉。

original: I have slain the six surviving nuns of the Order of the Ashen Veil and found the stronghold of Bal Meryan. Curate-Militant Bjorkild has rewarded me greatly and offered me the use of the Castellan's Quarters in the Fortress-Monastery.
string: 我杀死了灰纱修会剩下的六名修女，并找到了巴尔莫兰的要塞。参事武装-Bjorkild慷慨地奖励了我，并提供了要塞修道院里的城堡主住房。

original: The Dunmer woman is a nun from the Order of the Ashen Veil, a small sect of the Tribunal Temple. Her order has been assaulted by an extremist faction of the Vigilants of Stendarr who object to veneration of Azura, Boethiah, and Mephala. I have agreed to find the survivors of the Order.
string: 那个丹莫的女人是灰纱教团的一名修女，是三神庙的一个小教派。她的教团遭到了斯坦达尔警戒者的极端派系的袭击，他们反对对阿祖拉、波耶西亚和梅法拉的崇拜。我同意去寻找教团的幸存者。

original: I have found all the surviving sisters of the Order of the Ashen Veil. I must prepare to help them reclaim the Fortress-Monastery of Bal Meryan, and should speak to them whenever I wish to begin this venture.
string: 我找到了灰纱修会的所有幸存姐妹们。我必须准备好帮助她们夺回巴尔莫兰堡垒，并且在我想开始这个冒险时应该与她们交谈。

original: I have agreed to assist the Order of the Ashen Veil, a small sect of nuns from the Tribunal Temple. I am searching for a remote pass in the Velothi Mountains that leads to the lost Fortress-Monastery of Bal Meryon. After traveling south-east of Windhelm along the mountains, I can find the passage just past Ansilvund. It is north along the mountains from both Ansilvund and Kagrenzel.
string: 我已同意协助灰纱修会，这是一个来自三神庙的小修女教派。我正在寻找通往巴尔莫兰失落要塞修道院的瓦洛西山脉中的一处隐蔽通道。在沿着山脉向东南前往风盔城后，我可以在安之后找到通道。这个通道在安息坟和 卡格雷泽尔 的山脉北部。

original: I have agreed to assist the Order of the Ashen Veil, a small sect of nuns from the Tribunal Temple. I have found the pass through the Velothi Mountains, and must follow it to the Fortress-Monastery of Bal Meryan.
string: 我已经同意协助灰纱修会，这是一支来自法庭神殿的修女小团体。我已经找到穿越维洛斯山脉的道路，并必须顺着它前往巴尔莫兰堡垒-修道院。

original: I have agreed to assist the Order of the Ashen Veil, a small sect of nuns from the Tribunal Temple. I have emerged victorious against Stendarr's Hammer in the courtyard of Bal Meryan and must push onwards.
string: 我已经同意帮助灰纱修会，这是一群来自三一神殿的修女小教团。我在巴尔莫兰的庭院里成功击败了斯坦达尔之锤，必须继续前进。

original: I have agreed to assist the Order of the Ashen Veil, a small sect of nuns from the Tribunal Temple. I have battled my way to the throne room of Bal Meryan and now face off against Curate-Militant Bjorkild himself.
string: 我已经同意协助灰纱修会，这是一个来自法师公会的小修女教派。我已经战胜了通往巴尔莫兰宫殿的道路，现在正面对着武装护士本基尔德本人。

original: I am victorious in my battle against Stendarr's Hammer, and have reclaimed the Fortress-Monastery of Bal Meryan for the Order of the Ashen Veil. The keep itself is in good shape, and is well supplied. The temple shrines however, have been desecrated by the despicable Aedra Worshippers. With a good day's work we can clean up the shrines and the bodies scattered about Bal Meryan. I should start by clearing out the Altar of Stendarr in the Temple Chambers at the top of Bal Meryan.
string: 我在与斯坦达尔之锤的战斗中获胜，并为灰纱修会夺回了巴尔莫兰要塞修道院。要塞本身情况良好，供应充足。但神殿祭坛已被可鄙的阿德拉信徒亵渎。经过一天的努力，我们可以清理祭坛和散布在巴尔莫兰周围的尸体。我应该从清理巴尔莫兰顶层神殿大厅的斯坦达尔祭坛开始。

original: I am victorious in my battle against Stendarr's Hammer, and have reclaimed the Fortress-Monastery of Bal Meryan for the Order of the Ashen Veil. The keep itself is in good shape, and is well supplied. The temple shrines have been restored and the bodies cleared. Bal Meryan is a place of joy and contemplation once more. I have been granted full use of the Castellan's Quarters and may now call this place home should I choose.
string: 我在与斯坦达尔之锤的战斗中取得了胜利，并已为灰纱修会夺回了巴尔莫兰要塞修道院。堡垒本身状况良好，供应充足。神殿祭坛已经恢复，尸体也已清理干净。巴尔莫兰再次成为欢乐和冥想之地。我被授予了使用城堡主领地的全部权限，如选择，我现在可以称这个地方为家。

original: See if the Dunmer woman needs assistance.
string: 看看那个丹莫女人是否需要帮助。

original: Decide to help the Order of the Ashen Veil, or claim the bounty.
string: 决定是否帮助灰纱修会，或索取悬赏。

original: Hunt down the surviving members of the Order of the Ashen Veil and claim the bounty.
string: 追捕灰纱修会成员并领取赏金。

original: Track down and kill Drelyra Uvirith.
string: 追踪并杀掉德莉拉·乌维里思。

original: Track down and kill Selvoneth Uvirith.
string: 追踪并击败赛尔沃内斯·乌维里斯。

original: Track down and kill Vendressa Meleni.
string: 追杀温德丽莎·梅莱尼。

original: Track down and kill Ruveni Berandu.
string: 追杀并杀死鲁文妮·贝兰杜。

original: Track down and kill Ardela Vos.
string: 追踪并杀死阿尔黛拉·沃斯。

original: Track down and kill Nindasu Lerylas.
string: 追踪并杀死妮达苏·莱瑞拉斯。

original: Return to Curate-Militant Bjorkild for a reward.
string: 回到兵士牧师比约基尔那里领取奖励。

original: Gather the scattered survivors of the Order of the Ashen Veil.
string: 集合灰纱修会幸存者的残余。

original: Recruit Drelyra Uvirith.
string: 招募德莉拉·乌维里丝。

original: Recruit Selvoneth Uvirith.
string: 招募瑟尔沃内丝·乌维瑞斯。

original: Recruit Vendressa Meleni.
string: 招募温德丽莎·梅兰妮。

original: Recruit Ruveni Berandu.
string: 招募鲁文妮·伯兰杜。

original: Recruit Ardela Vos.
string: 招募阿尔黛拉·沃斯。

original: Recruit Nindasu Lerylas.
string: 招募妮达苏·莱拉斯。

original: Ask one of the Order of the Ashen Veil about reclaiming Bal Meryan.
string: 询问灰纱修会的一员关于夺回巴尔梅瑞恩的事宜。

original: UNUSED
string: 未使用

original: UNUSED
string: 未使用

original: Travel south-east of Windhelm then head through the Velothi Mountains near Ansilvund and Kagrenzel. Assault the stronghold of Bal Meryan.
string: 从风盔城向东南走然后穿过安息坟和卡格雷泽尔的维洛斯山脉。袭击巴尔莫兰的要塞。

original: Slay Curate-Militant Bjorkild and reclaim Bal Meryan.
string: 击败厅长-军事 Bijorkild 并夺回巴尔莫兰。

original: Remove the Altar of Stendarr in Bal Meryan's temple, located on the top floor of  the stronghold.
string: 移除巴尔莫兰庙宇里的斯坦达尔祭坛，位于堡垒的顶层。

original: Drelyra Follower Quest
string: 德莉拉随从任务

original: Selvoneth Follower Quest
string: 赛尔沃内斯追随者任务

original: Vendressa Follower Quest
string: 温德丽莎随从任务

original: Ruveni Follower Quest
string: 鲁文妮追随者任务

original: Ardela Follower Quest
string: 阿尔黛拉追随任务

original: Nindasu Follower Quest
string: 妮达苏跟班任务

original: Restaffing Bal Meryan
string: 重新安排巴尔莫兰的人员

original: I've helped the Sisters of the Order of the Ashen Veil to reclaim their stronghold of Bal Meryan. The keep itself is in excellent shape. It is well provisioned, and well fortified, but seriously lacking in services. I should ask the Sisters about their ideas for improving things.
string: 我已帮助灰纱修会夺回了他们的堡垒巴尔迎安。堡垒本身状态良好。它储备充足，设防严密，但服务严重不足。我应该和修女们讨论他们对改进事物的想法。

original: I've helped the Sisters of the Order of the Ashen Veil to reclaim their stronghold of Bal Meryan. The keep itself is in excellent shape. It is well provisioned, and well fortified, but seriously lacking in services. I've spoken with Vendressa and she suggested I talk to Nindasu or Drelyra.
string: 我已经帮助灰纱修会姐妹会夺回他们的要塞巴尔莫兰。要塞本身状况良好。它补给充足，设施齐备，但服务严重不足。我已经与温德丽莎交谈，她建议我与尼亚萨或德莉拉交谈。

original: I've helped the Sisters of the Order of the Ashen Veil to reclaim their stronghold of Bal Meryan. The keep itself is in excellent shape. It is well provisioned, and well fortified, but seriously lacking in services. I've spoken with Selvoneth and she suggested I talk to her sister Drelyra.
string: 我帮助灰纱修会的姐妹们夺回了它们的堡垒巴尔莫兰。堡垒本身状况良好。它储备充足，防御良好，但服务明显不足。我和赛尔沃内斯交谈过，她建议我找她的妹妹德莉拉谈一谈。

original: I've helped the Sisters of the Order of the Ashen Veil to reclaim their stronghold of Bal Meryan. The keep itself is in excellent shape. It is well provisioned, and well fortified, but seriously lacking in services. I've spoken with Ruveni and she suggested I talk to Nindasu.
string: 我帮助灰纱修会夺回了他们的巴尔莫兰据点。要塞本身状态良好。它提供充足，设施良好，但严重缺乏服务。我和鲁文妮谈过，她建议我与妮达苏交谈。

original: I've helped the Sisters of the Order of the Ashen Veil to reclaim their stronghold of Bal Meryan. The keep itself is in excellent shape. It is well provisioned, and well fortified, but seriously lacking in services. I've spoken with Drelyra, who informed me that the Bal Meryan is in dire need of an apothecary. Once I've spoken with Drelyra, Nindasu, and Ardela I should ask about where to go first.
string: 我帮助了灰纱修会的姐妹们夺回了他们的堡垒巴尔莫兰。城堡本身状况良好。它的供应充足，防御工事良好，但服务非常不足。我已经和德莉拉交谈过，她告诉我巴尔莫兰急需一名药剂师。在和德莉拉、妮达苏和阿尔黛拉交谈之后，我应该问问应该先去哪里。

original: I've helped the Sisters of the Order of the Ashen Veil to reclaim their stronghold of Bal Meryan. The keep itself is in excellent shape. It is well provisioned, and well fortified, but seriously lacking in services. I've spoken with Nindasu, who informed me that the Bal Meryan is in dire need of a cook. Once I've spoken with Drelyra, Nindasu, and Ardela I should ask about where to go first.
string: 我帮助灰纱姊妹们夺回了巴尔莫兰堡垒。堡垒本身的状况是极好的。它储备充足，设防良好，但服务十分匮乏。我与妮达苏交谈过，她告诉我巴尔莫兰急需一名厨师。一旦我与德莉拉、妮达苏和阿尔黛拉交谈过，我就应该询问该先做什么。

original: I've helped the Sisters of the Order of the Ashen Veil to reclaim their stronghold of Bal Meryan. The keep itself is in excellent shape. It is well provisioned, and well fortified, but seriously lacking in services. I've spoken with Drelyra, who informed me that the Bal Meryan is in dire need of a blacksmith. Once I've spoken with Drelyra, Nindasu, and Ardela I should ask about where to go first.
string: 我已经帮助灰纱修会的姐妹们夺回了他们的据点巴尔莫兰。城堡本身处于良好状态。它货物充足，设施齐全，但严重缺乏服务。我已经与德莉拉谈过，她告诉我巴尔莫兰急需一个铁匠。一旦我与德莉拉、妮达苏和阿尔黛拉谈过后，我应该询问接下来该怎么做。

original: I've helped the Sisters of the Order of the Ashen Veil to reclaim their stronghold of Bal Meryan. The keep itself is in excellent shape. It is well provisioned, and well fortified, but seriously lacking in services. I've spoken with Nindasu, Drelyra, and Ardela. They asked me to track down an apothecary, a smith, and a cook for the stronghold. Riften would be the best place to start looking.
string: 我帮助灰纱修会重新夺回他们的堡垒巴尔莫兰。堡垒本身状况良好。粮食充足，设施完善，但严重缺乏服务。我已经和 妮达苏、德莉拉以及阿尔黛拉交谈过。他们要我为堡垒找到一名药剂师、一名铁匠和一名厨师。裂谷城可能是最好的开始地点。

original: I've helped the Sisters of the Order of the Ashen Veil to reclaim their stronghold of Bal Meryan. The keep itself is in excellent shape. It is well provisioned, and well fortified, but seriously lacking in services. I've spoken with Nindasu, Drelyra, and Ardela. They asked me to track down an apothecary, a smith, and a cook for the stronghold. I looked around Riften and the locals suggested I check a camp just west of town.
string: 我已经帮助灰纱修会夺回了巴尔莫兰的城堡。城堡本身状况良好。粮食充足，防御良好，但严重缺乏服务。我跟妮达苏、德莉拉和阿尔黛拉谈过。她们请我帮忙找一名药剂师、一名铁匠和一名厨师来服务城堡。我在Riften周围转了转，当地人建议我去镇西边的一个营地查看。

original: I've helped the Sisters of the Order of the Ashen Veil to reclaim their stronghold of Bal Meryan. The keep itself is in excellent shape. It is well provisioned, and well fortified, but seriously lacking in services. I've spoken with Nindasu, Drelyra, and Ardela. They asked me to track down an apothecary, a smith, and a cook for the stronghold. I've found a woman named Lira in a small camp west of Riften. She seems down on her luck and should not take much convincing.
string: 我帮助灰纱教派的姐妹们夺回了巴尔莫兰要塞。要塞本身状态良好，物资充足，防御强大，但服务严重不足。我已经与妮达苏、德莉拉和阿尔黛拉交谈过。她们请我为要塞找到一名药剂师、一名铁匠和一名厨师。我在裂谷城城西边的一个小营地找到了一个名叫莉拉的女子。她看上去运气不佳，应该不难说服。

original: I've helped the Sisters of the Order of the Ashen Veil to reclaim their stronghold of Bal Meryan. The keep itself is in excellent shape. It is well provisioned, and well fortified, but seriously lacking in services. I've spoken with Nindasu, Drelyra, and Ardela. They asked me to track down an apothecary, a smith, and a cook for the stronghold. I met a woman named Lira in a camp west of Riften. She was eager at the chance to work as a cook, and will soon set off for Bal Meryan. Windhelm is the next place to go.
string: 我帮助灰纱修会修复了他们的堡垒巴尔莫兰。据说堡垒本身状况良好。它提供充足的供应品，设施很齐全，但服务严重不足。我和妮达苏、德莉拉、阿尔黛拉谈过。她们要我找到药剂师、锻造师和烹饪师。我在裂谷城西部的一个营地遇到了一位叫莉拉的女子。她渴望有机会担任烹饪师，并将很快出发去巴尔莫兰。下一站是风盔城。

original: I've helped the Sisters of the Order of the Ashen Veil to reclaim their stronghold of Bal Meryan. The keep itself is in excellent shape. It is well provisioned, and well fortified, but seriously lacking in services. I've spoken with Nindasu, Drelyra, and Ardela. They asked me to track down an apothecary, a smith, and a cook for the stronghold. I asked around Windhelm and the locals pointed me towards an unemployed smith staying at the New Gnisis Cornerclub.
string: 我已经帮助灰纱修会的姐妹们夺回了他们的堡垒巴尔莫兰。堡垒本身情况良好，有足够的供应和防御，但严重缺乏服务。我和妮达苏、德莉拉、阿岱拉交谈过，她们要求我为堡垒找到一名药剂师、一名铁匠和一名厨师。我在风盔城打听，当地人告诉我一个闲置的铁匠住在新格尼西斯角落俱乐部。

original: I've helped the Sisters of the Order of the Ashen Veil to reclaim their stronghold of Bal Meryan. The keep itself is in excellent shape. It is well provisioned, and well fortified, but seriously lacking in services. I've spoken with Nindasu, Drelyra, and Ardela. They asked me to track down an apothecary, a smith, and a cook for the stronghold. I found a woman named Kelspat who cannot work as a blacksmith due to the prejudice of the local Nords. I suspect she will be easily persuaded.
string: 我帮助了灰纱修会姐妹们夺回他们的堡垒巴尔莫兰。这个要塞本身状况卓越。它提供充分的粮食，防御设施出色，但服务方面缺乏。我已经与妮达苏、德莉拉和阿尔黛拉交谈。他们让我找到一位药剂师、一位铁匠和一个厨师为要塞服务。我找到了一位名叫凯尔斯帕特的女士，由于当地纳德人的偏见不能充当铁匠。我相信她会被轻易说服的。

original: I've helped the Sisters of the Order of the Ashen Veil to reclaim their stronghold of Bal Meryan. The keep itself is in excellent shape. It is well provisioned, and well fortified, but seriously lacking in services. I've spoken with Nindasu, Drelyra, and Ardela. They asked me to track down an apothecary, a smith, and a cook for the stronghold. I found a woman named Kelspat who could not work as a blacksmith due to the prejudice of the local Nords. She was easily persuaded and will head to Bal Meryan. I should return to Drelyra to inform her of my success.
string: 我帮助灰纱修会夺回了他们的要塞巴尔莫兰。要塞本身状态良好。它的供应充足，防御设施完备，但服务非常缺乏。我已经和妮达苏、德莉拉和雅德拉谈过了。她们让我为要塞找一个药剂师、一个铁匠和一个厨师。我找到了一个名叫凯尔斯帕特的妇女，但由于当地诺德人的偏见，她不能当铁匠工作。她很容易地就被说服了，会前往巴尔莫兰。我应该回到德莉拉那里告诉她我的成功。

original: I've found a chef and a smith for Bal Meryan, but could not find an apothecary among the refugees in Windhelm and Riften. Drelyra has received guidance from Azura, an echo of a desperate prayer for help from one of the faithful. I should go to Broken Fang Cave and look into this. The cave is just off the road, between Whiterun and Rorikstead.
string: 我已经为巴尔莫兰找到了一名厨师和一名铁匠，但在风盔城和裂谷城的难民中找不到一名药剂师。德莉拉已经接收到了阿祖拉的指引，这似乎是其中一名信徒绝望祈求帮助的回音。我应该前往碎牙洞穴，查看情况。洞穴就在通往惠特朗和罗瑞克斯泰德之间的路上。

original: Drelyra received guidance from Azura, an echo of a desperate prayer for help from one of the faithful. Following her guidance, I have arrived at Broken Fang Cave. The place is infested with vampires.
string: 德莉拉接受了阿祖拉的指引，这是信徒的一个绝望祈祷的回声。遵循她的指引，我来到了断牙洞穴。这个地方被吸血鬼所侵袭。

original: Drelyra received guidance from Azura, an echo of a desperate prayer for help from one of the faithful. I arrived at Broken Fang Cave and slew the vampires there, finding a Dunmer woman named Drinys in desperate prayer. She has gladly set out for Bal Meryan to become its apothecary. The next time I am at Bal Meryan, I should report my success to Drelyra.
string: 德莉拉从阿祖拉那里得到了指引，这是信徒绝望祈求帮助的回音。我来到了断牙洞穴，杀死了那里的吸血鬼，发现了一个叫德林斯的丹莫女人在绝望的祈祷中。她已经欣然前往巴尔莫兰成为药剂师。下次我去巴尔莫兰时，应该向德莉拉报告我的成功。

original: The new inhabitants are settling in well at Bal Meryan. Drinys has proven to be an accomplished scholar and apothecary and Kelspat is a decent blacksmith. Lira's cooking is... interesting and hopefully will improve over time.
string: 在巴尔莫兰新的居民适应得很好。德林斯被证明是一位优秀的学者和药剂师，凯尔斯帕特是一位不错的铁匠。莉拉的厨艺......很有趣，希望随着时间的推移会有所改善。

original: Ask the Sisters of the Order of the Ashen Veil about their ideas to improve Bal Meryan.
string: 询问灰纱修会有关改善巴尔莫兰的想法。

original: Find an apothecary.
string: 找个药剂师。

original: Find a cook.
string: 找个厨师。

original: Find a blacksmith.
string: 找一个铁匠。

original: Speak with Drelyra for guidance.
string: 与德莉拉交谈以获得指导。

original: Head to Broken Fang Cave between Whiterun and Rorikstead, just off the road.
string: 前往白漫和洛利克镇之间的断牙洞穴，就在路边。

original: Tell Drelyra of Azura's wisdom.
string: 告诉德莉拉阿祖拉的智慧。

original: Funding Bal Meryan
string: 资助巴尔莫兰

original: I should check with Ruveni or Vendressa to see if they have any ideas for improvements we could make to Bal Meryan.
string: 我应该询问鲁文妮或温德丽莎，看看他们是否有任何改进的想法，我们可以在巴尔莫兰做些什么。

original: I should check with Ruveni or Vendressa to see if they have any ideas for improvements we could make to Bal Meryan. Ruveni suggests that we reach out to the Thieves Guild to inform them that we'd be willing to manage a smuggling route between Morrowind and Skyrim.
string: 我应该与鲁文妮或温德丽莎商量一下，看看我们能对巴尔莫兰作出哪些改进。鲁文妮建议我们与窃贼公会取得联系，告知他们我们愿意管理晨风和天际之间的走私路线。

original: I should check with Ruveni or Vendressa to see if they have any ideas for improvements we could make to Bal Meryan. Vendressa thinks we should reach out to someone from the East Empire Company to see about getting supplies delivered through Morrowind.
string: 我应该去找鲁文妮或温德丽莎看看他们是否有任何关于我们能改进巴尔莫兰的想法。温德丽莎认为我们应该联系东帝国公司的人，看看能否通过晨风提供供应。

original: Ruveni suggests that we reach out to Delvin Mallry of the Riften Thieves Guild to inform him that we'd be willing to manage a smuggling route between Morrowind and Skyrim. Vendressa thinks we should reach out to someone from the East Empire Company to see about getting supplies delivered through Morrowind. Only Vittoria Vici at the Solitude Office would have that kind of clout. These tasks are not pressing and I should do them at my convenience.
string: 鲁文妮建议我们联系裂谷盗贼公会的德尔文·马洛里，告诉他我们愿意负责管理晨风和天际之间的走私路线。温德丽莎认为我们应该联系东帝国公司的某人，看看是否能通过晨风提供物资。只有独孤办公室的维多利亚·薇齐有这样的影响力。这些任务并不紧急，我可以在自己的便利时间内完成。

original: Ruveni suggests that we reach out to Delvin Mallry of the Riften Thieves Guild to inform him that we'd be willing to manage a smuggling route between Morrowind and Skyrim. Vendressa thinks we should reach out to someone from the East Empire Company to see about getting supplies delivered through Morrowind. Orthus Endario at the Windhelm Office could assist with that. These tasks are not pressing and I should do them at my convenience.
string: 鲁文妮建议我们联系裂谷城的盗贼公会的德尔文·马洛里，告诉他我们愿意管理晨风和天际之间的走私路线。温德丽莎认为我们应该与东帝国公司的某人联系，看看是否可以通过摩洛温德交付物资。风盔城的奥索斯·恩达瑞奥可以协助此事。这些任务并不紧急，我应该根据自己的方便来完成。

original: I've met with the East Empire Company and the Thieves Guild regarding Bal Meryan. The offer was too good to be passed up, and both the East Empire Company and the Thieves Guild agreed to pursue the lucrative new opportunities. I suspect the Order of the Ashen Veil could have profited much more from these arrangements. However, the Sisters will gain some measure of protection by their new commercial links. I should report my success to Drelyra.
string: 我已经与东帝国公司和盗贼公会就巴尔莫兰一事进行了会面。这个提议太过诱人，东帝国公司和盗贼公会都同意追求这些有利可图的新机会。我怀疑灰纱修会本可以从这些安排中获得更多利益。然而，姐妹们将通过新的商业联系获得一些保护。我应该向德莉拉报告我的成功。

original: I've met with the East Empire Company and the Thieves Guild regarding Bal Meryan. The offer was too good to be passed up, and both the East Empire Company and the Thieves Guild quickly agreed to pursue the lucrative new opportunity. I reported my success, and was informed that Selvoneth has finally finished thinking through her "Big Idea".
string: 我与东帝国公司和盗贼公会讨论了有关巴尔莫兰的事宜。这个提议实在是太诱人，东帝国公司和盗贼公会很快就同意追求这个利润丰厚的新机会。我报告了我的成功，被告知赛尔沃内斯终于完成了她的“大点子”的思考。

original: Selvoneth's "Big Idea" turned out to be a fairly clever one. Her extensive reading into the history of Aedric sects informed her that Stendarr's Hammer has a serious rivalry with several other sects of the Vigil of Stendarr. One of those sects, The Mithril Bulwark, is responsible for maintaining an ancient beacon in Southern Skyrim. She thinks that if I meet with these other Vigilants, I might be able to head off any future reprisals. The large bag of gold will help.
string: 赛尔沃内斯的“大想法”实际上是一个相当聪明的想法。她通过对圣灵教派历史的深入阅读得知，斯坦达尔之锤与斯坦达尔警戒者的几个其他教派存在严重的竞争关系。其中一个教派，秘银堡垒，负责维护天际南部的一个古老信标。她认为如果我与其他守备成员会面，也许可以避免未来的报复。这一大笔金钱会有所帮助。

original: I met with the Mithril Bulwark at Stendarr's Beacon. They accepted the gold, and promised that "any Daedra worshippers associated with the Tribunal Temple will be the last ones we cleanse". It seems they have far more pressing concerns. I suspect this is the best response I'll get from those fanatics. I should report my success to Drelyra.
string: 我在斯坦达尔信标与秘银壁垒会面。他们接受了黄金，并承诺“任何与三一神庙有牵连的迪德拉崇拜者都将是我们最后清理的对象”。看来他们有更紧迫的问题。我怀疑这是我从那些狂热者那里得到的最好的回应。我应该向德莉拉报告我的成功。

original: Bal Meryan has been thoroughly restaffed with an apothecary, a blacksmith, and a cook. Agreements with the East Empire Company and the Thieves Guild ensure that a steady stream of gold and goods will flow through the canyon. I have also achieved a tenuous peace with the main factions of the Vigil of Stendarr, though I do not know if that will hold in the long run.
string: 巴尔莫兰已经重新雇佣了一名药剂师、一名铁匠和一名厨师。与东帝国公司和盗贼公会达成的协议确保黄金和货物将持续流经峡谷。我还与斯坦达尔之锤的主要派系达成了脆弱的和平协议，尽管我不知道这种和平是否能持续下去。

original: Check in with Ruveni and Vendressa.
string: 与鲁文妮和温德丽莎确认。

original: Reach an agreement with the Thieves Guild.
string: 与盗贼行会达成协议。

original: Establish a contract with the East Empire Company.
string: 与东帝国公司建立合同。

original: Report your success to Drelyra.
string: 向德莉拉报告你的成功。

original: Speak with Selvoneth about her "Big Idea".
string: 与赛尔沃内斯谈谈她的“大想法”。

original: Deal with the mainstream Vigilants of Stendarr.
string: 处理斯坦达尔的警戒者。

original: Report back to Drelyra.
string: 回报给德莉拉。

original: A Quick Heist
string: 快速梭哈

original: I spoke with Delvin Mallory about setting up a smuggling route through the Velothi Mountains. He is interested in my proposal and seems likely to accept. However, as I probably should have expected, Mallory has asked me to complete a "simple job" for him to prove myself. I am to sneak into Councillor Morvayn's chambers in Raven Rock and steal a rare book, his favorite tome of fables, which he keeps under his bed.
string: 我和德尔文·马洛里谈过关于在维洛斯山脉设立走私路线的事。他对我的提议感兴趣，并可能会接受。然而，正如我应该预料到的，马洛里要求我完成一个“简单的任务”来证明自己。我必须潜入乌鸦岩的莫尔文议员的房间，偷走一本珍稀书，他藏在床底下的最喜爱传奇故事的书。

original: I spoke with Delvin Mallory about setting up a smuggling route through the Velothi Mountains. He is interested in my proposal and seems likely to accept. Mallory asked that I first prove myself, so I agreed to slip into Councillor Morvayn's chambers in Raven Rock and steal his favorite slippers. However, I found no slippers, only a note instructing me that Master Neloth of Tel Mithryn had taken the tome, and that I should seek to steal it instead from him. Apparently he is ALSO keeping it under his bed.
string: 我与德尔文·马洛瑞讨论通过维洛斯山脉建立走私路线的事情。他对我的提议很感兴趣，似乎很可能会接受。马洛瑞要求我先证明自己，所以我同意潜入乌鸦岩议员莫芙恩的府邸，偷走他最喜爱的拖鞋。然而，我没有找到拖鞋，只找到一张告诉我，特尔·密斯林的尼洛斯大师已经带走了卷轴，而我应该设法从他那里偷走。显然他也把它放在床底下。

original: I spoke with Delvin Mallory about setting up a smuggling route through the Velothi Mountains. He is interested in my proposal and seems likely to accept. Mallory asked that I first prove myself, so I agreed to steal a rare book, a tome of fables. The book was supposedly in the possession of Councillor Morvayn, then Master Neloth, but upon sneaking into Neloth's chambers I found only a note, instructing I go to Skaal Village and steal the tome there, which is supposedly under Chief Fanari Strong-Voice's bed. I suspect I am the victim of an elaborate prank.
string: 我和德尔文·马洛瑞讨论了穿越维洛斯山脉的走私路线。他对我的建议很感兴趣，似乎很可能会接受。马洛瑞要求我首先证明自己，所以我同意偷一本稀有书，一本寓言之书。据说这本书原本属于莫尔维顾问，后来被涅洛斯大师所得，但在潜入涅洛斯的房间时，我只找到了一张纸条，指示我去斯卡尔村偷走那本书，据称是在弗纳里·斯特朗维斯酋长的床下。我怀疑自己是一个巧妙恶作剧的受害者。

original: I spoke with Delvin Mallory about setting up a smuggling route through the Velothi Mountains. He is interested in my proposal and seems likely to accept. Mallory asked that I first prove myself, so I agreed to steal a rare book, a tome of fables. The book was supposedly in the possession of Councillor Morvayn, then Master Neloth, then Chief Fanari Strong-Voice. Of course, none of them had it and I was instead the victim of an elaborate prank by Delvin Mallory, who likely had the book all along. I should return to him regarding this.
string: 我与德尔文·马洛里交谈了关于在维洛斯山脉建立走私路线的事情。他对我的提议很感兴趣，似乎可能会接受。马洛里要求我先证明自己，所以我同意偷一本稀有书，一本寓言之书。这本书据说曾在莫凡议员、然后是尼洛施大师，然后是芬纳丽强声首领手中。当然，他们都没有这本书，相反，我成了德尔文·马洛里的一个精心恶作剧的受害者，他很可能一直就有这本书。我应该就这件事回去找他。

original: I spoke with Delvin Mallory about setting up a smuggling route through the Velothi Mountains. He is interested in my proposal and seems likely to accept. I tried to prove myself by stealing a rare book, but was the victim of an elaborate prank instead. Mallory had a good laugh, and told me that all he was really looking for was my willingness to bend the rules and "get my hands dirty". He has signed the agreement and assured me that he looks forward to many years of profitable collaboration.
string: 我和德尔文·马洛里讨论了在维洛斯群山设置一条走私路线的计划。他对我的提议很感兴趣，看起来很可能会接受。我试图通过窃取一本稀有书来证明自己，但却成了精心布置的一个恶作剧的受害者。马洛里大笑起来，并告诉我，他真正想要的只是我的愿意触犯规则，"染指一些龌龊之事"。他已签署了协议，并向我保证期待着许多年的盈利合作。

original: Steal the tome from Councillor Morvayn's chambers.
string: 从莫尔凡参议员的房间里偷取圣经。

original: Steal the tome from Master Neloth's chambers.
string: 从尼洛施大师的房间里偷取卷轴。

original: Steal the tome from Fanari Strong-Voice's chambers.
string: 从范娜瑞·浑音的房间里偷取卷轴。

original: Speak with Delvin Mallory about the elaborate prank.
string: 和德尔文·玛洛里谈论关于复杂恶作剧的事情。

original: A Lucrative Offer
string: 一个名利丰厚的提议

original: I have spoken with Vittoria Vici, head of the Solitude office of the East Empire Company, about setting up a supply route through the Inner Sea in Morrowind. She is interested in hearing about my proposal, but doesn't want to know the details until I've sorted out an issue she is having with an Imperial official. The man, Auditor Fastidius Verontus, is a stickler for rules and details, and is minutely examining every detail of the Solitude office's operation. If I am to secure an agreement, I must deal with him somehow.
string: 我已经与东帝国公司独孤办事处的负责人维多利亚·薇齐谈过在晨风内陆海建立供应路线的事情。她对我的提议感兴趣，但在我解决她与一个帝国官员之间的问题之前，她不想知道细节。这个名叫审计员法斯堤迪乌斯·维洛特斯的人极度拘泥于规则和细节，正在细致检查独孤办事处的每个细节。如果我要达成协议，我必须想办法处理他。

original: I have spoken with Vittoria Vici, head of the Solitude office of the East Empire Company, about setting up a supply route through the Inner Sea in Morrowind. She is interested in hearing about my proposal, but doesn't want to know the details until I've sorted out an issue she is having with an Imperial official. The man, Auditor Fastidius Verontus, is a stickler for rules and details, and is minutely examining every detail of the Solitude office's operation. I've spoken with Fastidius and convinced him that it is time for a meal break. He is headed to the Winking Skeever. I'll have only a few minutes to think up my next ploy.
string: 我已经和维多利亚·薇齐交谈过，她是东帝国公司所在地独孤城办事处的负责人，关于在晨风的内海开辟供应线路的事。她对我的提议很感兴趣，但在我解决她与一个帝国官员的问题之前，她不想知道细节。那个名叫审计员法斯蒂迪乌斯·维兰图斯的男人对规则和细节非常挑剔，正在细致检查独孤城办事处每一个细节。我已经和法斯蒂迪乌斯谈过，并说服他是时候休息吃饭了。他正在去走昂眼的病怪。我只有几分钟时间考虑下一步计划。

original: I have spoken with Vittoria Vici, head of the Solitude office of the East Empire Company, about setting up a supply route through the Inner Sea in Morrowind. She is interested in hearing about my proposal, but doesn't want to know the details until I've sorted out an issue she is having with an Imperial official. The man, Auditor Fastidius Verontus, is a stickler for rules and details, and is minutely examining every detail of the Solitude office's operation. I've spoken with Fastidius and tried to threaten him into relenting. He reacted extremely poorly, and shouted about me "getting what I deserve".
string: 我已经和维多利亚·薇齐交谈过，她是东帝国公司所在地独孤城办事处的负责人，关于在晨风的内海开辟供应线路的事。她对我的提议很感兴趣，但在我解决她与一个帝国官员的问题之前，她不想知道细节。那个名叫审计员法斯蒂迪乌斯·维兰图斯的男人对规则和细节非常挑剔，正在细致检查独孤城办事处每一个细节。我已经和法斯蒂迪乌斯谈过，并试图威胁他让步。他反应非常不好，大声叫嚷着说我“得到应有的报应”。

original: I have spoken with Vittoria Vici, head of the Solitude office of the East Empire Company, about setting up a supply route through the Inner Sea in Morrowind. She is interested in hearing about my proposal, but doesn't want to know the details until I've sorted out an issue she is having with an Imperial official. The man, Auditor Fastidius Verontus, is a stickler for rules and details, and is minutely examining every detail of the Solitude office's operation. I just decided to kill the man. The docks are a dangerous place, I'm not associated with the East Empire Company, and authorities will simply deem this a random murder.
string: 我已经与东帝国公司独孤城分公司负责人维多利亚·薇齐谈过，谈到在晨风通过内海建立供应线路的事情。她对我的提议很感兴趣，但不想在我解决与帝国官员发生的问题之前就知道详情。这个人，审计员法斯提迪奥斯·维伦图斯，是一个看似遵守规则和细节的人，他正密切检查着独孤城分公司运营的每一个细节。我决定杀掉这个人。码头是个危险的地方，我与东帝国公司无关，当局会简单地认定这是一起随机谋杀案。

original: I have spoken with Vittoria Vici, head of the Solitude office of the East Empire Company, about setting up a supply route through the Inner Sea in Morrowind. She is interested in hearing about my proposal, but doesn't want to know the details until I've sorted out an issue she is having with an Imperial official. The man, Auditor Fastidius Verontus, is a stickler for rules and details, and is minutely examining every detail of the Solitude office's operation. I lured Auditor Fastidius to the Winking Skeever, where I plied him with drinks until he passed out.
string: 我已经与东帝国公司办公室负责人维多利亚·薇齐交谈过，关于在晨风的内海开设供应线路。她对听取我的提案很感兴趣，但不想在我解决她与帝国官员之间的问题之前知道详情。这位名叫审计师 法斯提迪厄斯·维伦图斯的人，一向严格遵守规则和细节，并正在精心审查独孤城办公室的运营情况。我引诱审计师法斯提迪厄斯到了眨眼老鼠旅馆，我给他灌了酒，直到他昏倒。

original: I have spoken with Vittoria Vici, head of the Solitude office of the East Empire Company, about setting up a supply route through the Inner Sea in Morrowind. She is interested in hearing about my proposal, but doesn't want to know the details until I've sorted out an issue she is having with an Imperial official. The man, Auditor Fastidius Verontus, is a stickler for rules and details, and is minutely examining every detail of the Solitude office's operation. After I threatened him, he called a group of thugs to attack me! I dispatched the thugs, and should speak with him once more.
string: 我已经与维多利亚·薇齐，东帝国公司独孤办事处负责人，谈过关于在晨风进行内海补给路线的事情。她对听取我的建议很感兴趣，但在我解决她与一位帝国官员的问题之前，她不想知道具体细节。这位名叫审计官法斯迪迪厄斯·维龙图斯的男子一丝不苟，一丝不苟地检查着独孤办事处运营的每一个细节。在我威胁了他之后，他召集了一群暴徒来袭击我！我打败了这些暴徒，应该再次与他交谈。

original: I have spoken with Vittoria Vici, head of the Solitude office of the East Empire Company, about setting up a supply route through the Inner Sea in Morrowind. She is interested in hearing about my proposal, but doesn't want to know the details until I've sorted out an issue she is having with an Imperial official. The man, Auditor Fastidius Verontus, is a stickler for rules and details, and is minutely examining every detail of the Solitude office's operation. I lured Auditor Fastidius to the Winking Skeever, where I plied him with drinks until he passed out. I came up with a truly embarrasing story that allowed me to blackmail him.
string: 我已与东帝国公司独孤办事处负责人维多利亚·薇齐谈过，在晨风设立一个通过内海的供应线路。她对我的提议很感兴趣，但不想在我解决她与帝国官员之间的问题之前知道详情。这名男子，审计员法斯蒂迪乌斯·维隆图斯，对规则和细节很挑剔，正在详细检查索利都办事处的运作情况。我把审计员法斯蒂迪乌斯引诱到神态愉快的眩晕酒馆，灌醉他直到昏迷。我编造了一个真正令人尴尬的故事，让我能勒索他。

original: I have spoken with Vittoria Vici, head of the Solitude office of the East Empire Company, about setting up a supply route through the Inner Sea in Morrowind. She is interested in hearing about my proposal, but doesn't want to know the details until I've sorted out an issue she is having with an Imperial official. The man, Auditor Fastidius Verontus, is a stickler for rules and details, and is minutely examining every detail of the Solitude office's operation. After I threatened him, he called a group of thugs to attack me! I dispatched the thugs and intimidated him into leaving town.
string: 关于在晨风的内海设置补给线的事，我已经与东帝国公司独孤城办公室的负责人维多利亚·薇齐谈过。她对我的提议很感兴趣，但不想在我解决她与一位帝国官员发生的问题之前知道具体细节。这位名为审计官法斯提迪乌斯·维隆特的人，对规则和细节非常讲究，正在详细审查独孤城办公室的每一个细节。在我威胁他之后，他召集了一群暴徒来袭击我！我击败了这些暴徒，并威胁他离开了城镇。

original: I have spoken with Vittoria Vici, head of the Solitude office of the East Empire Company, about setting up a supply route through the Inner Sea in Morrowind. She is interested in hearing about my proposal, but doesn't want to know the details until I've sorted out an issue she is having with an Imperial official. The man, Auditor Fastidius Verontus, is a stickler for rules and details, and is minutely examining every detail of the Solitude office's operation. After I threatened him, he called a group of thugs to attack me! I dispatched the thugs and killed him for his actions.
string: 我已经与独孤城东帝国公司办事处的负责人维多利亚·薇齐交谈过，关于在晨风内海开设供应路线的问题。她对听取我的提议很感兴趣，但在解决她与一个帝国官员的问题之前，她不想知道细节。这个人，稽核员法斯蒂迪乌斯·维隆?特斯，是一个对规则和细节极端严格的人，正在细致检查索利都办事处的每一个细节。在我威胁他之后，他召集了一伙暴徒袭击我！我打败了暴徒并为他的行为杀了他。

original: I have spoken with Vittoria Vici, head of the Solitude office of the East Empire Company, about setting up a supply route through the Inner Sea in Morrowind. I dealt with a problematic Auditor for her, after which Vici signed the agreement on behalf of the East Empire Company.
string: 我已经和独孤城东帝国公司办事处负责人维多利亚·薇齐谈过了，关于在晨风通过内海设置一条供货路线。为她解决了一个麻烦的审计员之后，维奇代表东帝国公司签署了协议。

original: I have spoken with Orthus Endario, head of the Windhelm office of the East Empire Company, about setting up a supply route through the Inner Sea in Morrowind. He is interested in hearing about my proposal, but doesn't want to know the details until I've sorted out an issue he is having with an Imperial official. The man, Auditor Fastidius Verontus, is a stickler for rules and details, and is minutely examining every detail of the Windhelm office's operation. If I am to secure an agreement, I must deal with him somehow.
string: 我已经和东帝国公司风盔城负责人奥苏斯·恩达里欧谈过了，关于在晨风的内海中建立一条供应线路的事。他对我的提议很感兴趣，但在我解决他与一个帝国官员的问题之前，他不想知道细节。这个人，审计员法斯提迪乌斯·维隆托斯，是一个对规则和细节要求很严的人，他在细致地审查风盔城办事处的每一个细节。如果我想要达成协议，就必须想办法应付他。

original: I have spoken with Orthus Endario, head of the Windhelm office of the East Empire Company, about setting up a supply route through the Inner Sea in Morrowind. He is interested in hearing about my proposal, but doesn't want to know the details until I've sorted out an issue he is having with an Imperial official. The man, Auditor Fastidius Verontus, is a stickler for rules and details, and is minutely examining every detail of the Windhelm office's operation. I've spoken with Fastidius and convinced him that it is time for a meal break. He is headed to Candlehearth Hall. I'll have only a few minutes to think up my next ploy.
string: 我已经和东帝国公司风盔城办事处主管奥撒斯·恩达里奥谈过，关于在晨风建立一个通过内海运输路线的问题。他对我的提议很感兴趣，但希望在我解决他与一个帝国官员的问题之前不要知道细节。这名男子，审计员法斯迪迪斯·维伦图斯，是一个一丝不苟的人，他正在精细审查风盔城办事处的每一个细节。我已经和维伦图斯交谈，并说服他现在正是用餐时间。他正前往烛炉堂旅店。我只有几分钟想出下一步计划。

original: I have spoken with Orthus Endario, head of the Windhelm office of the East Empire Company, about setting up a supply route through the Inner Sea in Morrowind. He is interested in hearing about my proposal, but doesn't want to know the details until I've sorted out an issue he is having with an Imperial official. The man, Auditor Fastidius Verontus, is a stickler for rules and details, and is minutely examining every detail of the Windhelm office's operation.I've spoken with Fastidius and tried to threaten him into relenting. He reacted extremely poorly, and shouted about me "getting what I deserve".
string: 我已经与东帝国公司风盔城办事处主管奥斯修·恩达里奥谈过，关于在晨风建立一条通过内海的供应路线。他对我的提议很感兴趣，但在我解决他和一个帝国官员之间的问题之前，他不想知道具体细节。这个人，稽核官法斯提迪乌斯·维隆图斯，对规则和细节非常严格，正在对风盔城办事处的运营进行细致检查。我已经和维隆图斯交谈过，试图威胁他放手。他反应极其恶劣，大声说我“将得到应有的惩罚”。

original: I have spoken with Orthus Endario, head of the Windhelm office of the East Empire Company, about setting up a supply route through the Inner Sea in Morrowind. He is interested in hearing about my proposal, but doesn't want to know the details until I've sorted out an issue he is having with an Imperial official. The man, Auditor Fastidius Verontus, is a stickler for rules and details, and is minutely examining every detail of the Windhelm office's operation. I just decided to kill the man. The docks are a dangerous place, I'm not associated with the East Empire Company, and authorities will simply deem this a random murder.
string: 我已经和东帝国公司风盔城办事处负责人奥西斯·恩达里奥谈过了，关于在晨风的内海建立供应线路。他有兴趣听我提议，但不想在我解决他与帝国官员Fastidius Verontus的问题之前知道细节。这个人是Fastidius Verontus审计员，他对规则和细节要求非常严格，正在详细审查温德希尔办事处的运营细节。我决定杀了这个人。码头是一个危险的地方，我与东帝陆公司无关，当局只会将这看作是一桩随机谋杀案。

original: I have spoken with Orthus Endario, head of the Windhelm office of the East Empire Company, about setting up a supply route through the Inner Sea in Morrowind. He is interested in hearing about my proposal, but doesn't want to know the details until I've sorted out an issue he is having with an Imperial official. The man, Auditor Fastidius Verontus, is a stickler for rules and details, and is minutely examining every detail of the Windhelm office's operation. I lured Auditor Fastidius to Candlehearth Hall, where I plied him with drinks until he passed out.
string: 我已经与东帝国公司风盔城办事处的负责人奥修斯·恩德里奥谈过，关于在晨风建立一条通过内海的补给线。他有兴趣听取我的提议，但不希望在我解决他与帝国官员之间的问题之前知道具体细节。该男子名为审计官法斯蒂迪乌斯·维隆图斯，他非常讲究规则和细节，正在细致检查风盔城办事处的运作的每一个细节。我把审计官法斯蒂迪乌斯引诱到烛炉堂旅店，一直给他喝酒，直到他昏倒。

original: I have spoken with Orthus Endario, head of the Windhelm office of the East Empire Company, about setting up a supply route through the Inner Sea in Morrowind. He is interested in hearing about my proposal, but doesn't want to know the details until I've sorted out an issue he is having with an Imperial official. The man, Auditor Fastidius Verontus, is a stickler for rules and details, and is minutely examining every detail of the Windhelm office's operation. After I threatened him, he called a group of thugs to attack me! I dispatched the thugs, and should speak with him once more.
string: 我已经与东帝国公司风盔城办事处负责人奥索斯·恩达瑞奥讨论过，关于在摩洛温德的内海设置供应路线的事宜。他对我的提议感兴趣，但希望在我解决他与一个帝国官员存在的问题之前，不要知晓细节。这个人是审计官法斯提迪乌斯·维隆图斯，对规则和细节非常严格，正在详细审查风盔城办事处的每个细节。在我威胁了他之后，他召集了一群暴徒来攻击我！我打发了暴徒，应该再次与他交谈一次。

original: I have spoken with Orthus Endario, head of the Windhelm office of the East Empire Company, about setting up a supply route through the Inner Sea in Morrowind. He is interested in hearing about my proposal, but doesn't want to know the details until I've sorted out an issue he is having with an Imperial official. The man, Auditor Fastidius Verontus, is a stickler for rules and details, and is minutely examining every detail of the Windhelm office's operation. I lured Auditor Fastidius to Candlehearth Hall, where I plied him with drinks until he passed out. I came up with a truly embarrasing story that allowed me to blackmail him.
string: 我已经和东帝国公司风盔城办公室主任奥索斯·恩达里奥谈过，在晨风设立供应线路的事宜。他对我的提议很感兴趣，但在我解决他与一个帝国官员之间的问题之前，他不想知道细节。这位名叫审计官法斯提迪乌斯·维伦图斯的人，是一个对规则和细节很讲究的人，正在细致检查风盔城办公室的一举一动。我把他引诱到烛炉堂旅店，给他灌了酒，直到他昏倒。我编造了一个真正尴尬的故事，让我能够勒索他。

string: 我已经与东帝国公司风盔城办事处的负责人奥特斯·恩达里奥谈过关于在晨风内陆海建立供应路线的事情。他对我的提议很感兴趣，但在我解决他与一个帝国官员之间的问题之前，他不想知道细节。这个名叫审计员法斯堤迪乌斯·维洛特斯的人极度拘泥于规则和细节，正在细致检查风盔城办事处的每个细节。在我威胁他后，他召集了一群暴徒来攻击我！我击败了这些暴徒并吓得他离开了城镇。

original: I have spoken with Orthus Endario, head of the Windhelm office of the East Empire Company, about setting up a supply route through the Inner Sea in Morrowind. He is interested in hearing about my proposal, but doesn't want to know the details until I've sorted out an issue he is having with an Imperial official. The man, Auditor Fastidius Verontus, is a stickler for rules and details, and is minutely examining every detail of the Windhelm office's operation. After I threatened him, he called a group of thugs to attack me! I dispatched the thugs and killed him for his actions.
string: 我已经与东帝国公司风盔城办事处负责人奥特斯·恩达里奥谈过，在晨风建立一个通过内海的供应路线。他对我的提议很感兴趣，但不想在我解决他与一个帝国官员的问题之前知道细节。这位名叫审计官法斯蒂迪乌斯·维洛特斯的男子一心细节和规则，正细致检查风盔城办事处的每一个细节。在我威胁他之后，他召集了一群暴徒来攻击我！我击败了那些暴徒，并因他的行动而将他杀死。

original: I have spoken with Orthus Endario, head of the Windhelm office of the East Empire Company, about setting up a supply route through the Inner Sea in Morrowind. I dealt with a problematic Auditor for him, after which Endario signed the agreement on behalf of the East Empire Company.
